title: PO Sênior - Carnê Digital MagaluPay
description:
Sobre o MagaluPay e o Carnê Digital MagaluPay:

No

Magalu , estamos transformando a experiência de consumo dos nossos clientes, e o

Carnê Digital MagaluPay

é uma peça fundamental dessa evolução. Essa nova operação de crédito de consumo oferece uma forma inovadora de pagamento no app, ampliando o poder de compra de nossos clientes com propostas pré-aprovadas. O produto, já estruturado, possui um backlog robusto com inúmeras oportunidades de melhorias e evoluções, identificadas durante as sessões de discovery com times cross-funcionais. Precisamos de alguém que acompanhe de perto o início dessa operação, gerencie entregas do backlog e descubra novas oportunidades por meio da análise de indicadores, feedback do produto e satisfação do cliente.

Responsabilidades:

Priorização do backlog

– Compreender a experiência do cliente e definir prioridades com base em oportunidades identificadas. Coordenação de times

– Colaborar com UX e Tecnologia em todas as etapas de discovery, design, desenvolvimento e deploy. Acompanhamento e impacto

– Monitorar melhorias, avaliar indicadores e garantir impacto positivo na satisfação do cliente. Gestão de roadmap e métricas

– Construir um roadmap estratégico e acompanhar métricas para ajustar o produto conforme os resultados. Comunicação e alinhamento

– Atuar como ponte entre áreas de negócios, UX, tecnologia e stakeholders, garantindo clareza e visibilidade.

Requisitos Essenciais

Planejamento e organização

– Habilidade para gerenciar prazos, detalhes e documentações detalhadas no Confluence. Comunicação e negociação

– Facilidade para alinhar áreas de negócios e stakeholders sobre a evolução do produto. Trabalho multidisciplinar

– Experiência com times diversos, inspirando e orquestrando esforços em torno do propósito do produto. Resolução de problemas

– Capacidade de sintetizar desafios e propor soluções ágeis e inovadoras, considerando tendências de mercado. Metodologias ágeis

– Experiência com Scrum e Kanban para gestão de backlog e entregas. Análise de dados

– Familiaridade com Google Analytics, Looker e SQL para interpretação de métricas de produto. Mapeamento de processos

– Conhecimento em ferramentas como Camunda, Bizagi, Miro ou Lucidchart para diagramas e fluxos. Noções técnicas

– Compreensão básica de arquitetura de software, APIs e integrações para facilitar colaboração com desenvolvedores. Experiência com UX Analytics

– Uso de ferramentas como Hotjar para analisar comportamento do usuário e transformar insights em melhorias.

Diferenciais Experiência no lançamento de produtos digitais, especialmente no setor

financeiro . Conhecimento em produtos de crédito e empréstimo para pessoas físicas. Vivência no acompanhamento de implementações e novos projetos. Habilidade técnica para definir fluxos e processos no desenvolvimento de produtos.

Como é o ambiente de trabalho? Na MagaluPay, temos grande autonomia e responsabilidade, somos multidisciplinares, auto gerenciáveis e com pouca burocracia no nosso cotidiano. Buscamos romper as barreiras que diminuem nossa capacidade de agregar valor ao negócio. Fazemos entregas frequentes e agimos rapidamente ao encontrar problemas; nosso ritmo é acelerado, mas temos tranquilidade e equilíbrio para planejar e executar nossas tarefas com qualidade.

title: Especialista de Segmento PF
description: Liderar e acompanhar a estratégia de segmentação e subsegmentação do público que lidera, influenciando as equipes para assegurar a implementação eficaz; Acompanhar e apoiar o mapeamento do ciclo de vida dos associados, monitorando os resultados e reportando progressos e necessidades de ajustes; Liderar e implementar a construção de propostas de valor do segmento e subsegmentos e desdobrar estratégias com demais áreas envolvidas; Garantir a comunicação eficaz dos resultados e insights do mapeamento da jornada, influenciando e engajando demais times. Liderar e motivar a equipe no enfrentamento dos desafios de negócio, promovendo a evolução do segmento e a geração de valor; Contribuir e implementar a execução da estratégia de segmento e do ciclo estratégico, auxiliando na evolução do ciclo de vida dos associados; Implementar uma abordagem centrada no cliente/associado para melhorar os resultados da organização; Apoiar na definição das ambições de evolução, conectar e colaborar com demais áreas para desenvolver e ajustar produtos e serviços conectados as ambições de evolução; Monitorar os resultados do segmento/público e o resultado das ações para atingir os objetivos relacionados ao segmento.

title: Infrastructure Engineer, Cloud
description:
We’re looking for someone to join our Engineering team at Ferrum. Are you interested in building services to help hospitals detect and eliminate the millions of medical errors that occur every year? If so, read on.

What You Will Do Ferrum is a distributed, fast-growing company where you will be wearing many hats and pitch in on different components and projects across the organization. That said, here are some examples of what you’ll do:

Working with application developers to design infrastructure and deploy services into multiple cloud environments Taking ownership of our build and deployment pipeline for application code and container images Implementing Infrastructure as Code best practices in order to maintain reliable systems Applying your Linux knowledge to maintain, extend, and scale our hybrid cloud platform

You Have Experience With:

At least 4 years of relevant DevOps experience At least 2 years of cost-effective infrastructure system design experience At least 3 years of maintaining production environments using Terraform and other IaC tools Writing binaries, libraries, and microservices in Go or Python Cost management with GCP or other cloud service providers Release management and deployment methodologies Bare metal and lower level infrastructure

Preferred Experience, But Not Required:

Google Cloud certification With Linux operating system internals, filesystems, disk/storage technologies and storage protocols A working knowledge of modern security practices (ex: remediation plans, CVEs, firewalls, intrusion detection systems, vulnerability scanners) Linux and physical networking (ex: routing, switching, Wireshark) as well as networking constructs in cloud environments

You love efficiency and automation.

Your work at Ferrum will have a huge impact on the business. You take pride in developing scripts, tools, and services to help the team perform at a high level and scale to new challenges. You should be proficient with BASH and familiar with Python--but Go is even better.

You ensure the security of our systems and the privacy of our customers' data.

You keep up to date with security bulletins and CVEs. You’ve been a part of or even led remediation plans to swiftly implement fixes. You can provide architecture guidance for hybrid cloud solutions and implement them when necessary. You have experience and opinions on vulnerability scanners, firewalls, and intrusion detection systems.

You strive to take ownership of a project from ideation to delivery and maintenance.

Your experience provides a framework for you to work independently on several initiatives which will provide significant and measurable value to our customers. Seek opportunities to develop horizontal technologies that benefit multiple teams. Build developer tools to increase efficiency of all teams at Ferrum.

You communicate and document everything.

At Ferrum, we are a distributed team. A culture of sharing and documentation allows everyone to work together. We are looking for a practitioner of clear documentation that is well-maintained.

And most importantly, you want to make a positive and lasting impact on the world.

You understand that technology has the power to improve people’s lives and enrich our society.

title: Luxury Travel Consultant
description:
Se você tem

experiência em vendas, conhece destinos internacionais e sabe lidar com clientes de alto padrão , esta pode ser a sua oportunidade. A

Honeymooners

é uma agência referência em viagens de luxo e lua de mel em Portugal (iniciando agora no Brasil), criando experiências exclusivas para casais exigentes. Buscamos consultores de viagens especializados no mercado de luxo, que saibam vender e atender clientes com alto nível de personalização.

viagens personalizadas para clientes que buscam experiências exclusivas no exterior. Conduzir reuniões de vendas e entender as necessidades de cada casal. (espanhol é um diferencial). Organização, proatividade e

foco total em resultados . Experiência com CRM e ferramentas de reservas é um diferencial.

O que oferecemos Salário fixo entre R$ 5.000 e R$ 15.000 , ajustado conforme a experiência. Comissões agressivas , com possibilidade de ganhos elevados. Trabalho remoto , mas com acompanhamento próximo e metas bem definidas. Treinamento contínuo

em vendas, turismo e atendimento ao cliente de luxo. Oportunidade de crescimento

em uma empresa internacional em expansão.

CV e um vídeo curto (máx. 2 minutos)

explicando sua experiência em vendas e por que você se encaixa na vaga para



com o assunto

"Luxury Travel Consultant – (SEU NOME)" .

Se você tem paixão por vendas, conhecimento de destinos de luxo e deseja crescer em uma empresa de nível internacional, esta é a sua oportunidade. Candidate-se agora!

title: Profissional Back End Java /Aws - SR
description:
Código da vaga: 43812

Sobre a BRQ Digital

Há 32 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.

Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.

BRQ WAY

No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!

É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.

Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.

Ei Profissional Back End Java /Aws - SR, chegou o momento de encarar um novo desafio em sua carreira! Venha ser um #ferabrq

- O que procuramos?

Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!

- O que você deve ter?

Habilidades Principais: Tecnologias : Java 11+, Spring Boot, JUnit, Kubernetes, AWS Lambda, Cloud AWS, mensageria (Kafka/SQS/RabbitMQ), testes unitários e de integração, Design Patterns. Habilidades Técnicas : Conhecimento em SOLID, Scrum e desenvolvimento de soluções eficientes. Resolução de Problemas : Excelente raciocínio lógico e capacidade de segmentar problemas complexos. Comunicação e Liderança : Boa comunicação verbal, não verbal e escrita, além de habilidade para liderar iniciativas na squad. Responsabilidades : Desenvolver soluções escaláveis e contribuir para a evolução técnica da equipe.

- O que temos pra te oferecer?

Mais do que um plano de carreira !

A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:

Carreira técnica:

Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!

Carreira de Liderança:

Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.

Experiência internacional:

Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.

Empreendedorismo:

De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.

- E os benefícios?

Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Atuação híbrida; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!

- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?

Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions

Curtiu? Então inscreva-se e venha para o melhor da Transformação Digital com a gente!

title: Android Developer
description:
Project Description: Luxoft is one of the major software services companies worldwide. In particular, we develop high-quality software in automotive industry for most famous car makers.

The software inside a vehicle was traditionally expected to be a very controlled and self-contained environment. Equipping cars with perception and machine intelligence changes a lot in the overall picture of the vehicle manufacturer. Luxoft's goal is to empower our customers, with deep domain knowledge and smart solutions, to develop cars of the future.

Familiarity with JIRA, Bitbucket, Confluence, etc. Experience working on Qualcomm Android Platform with QNX Hypervisor (desirable). Proficiency in Android and QNX/Linux development projects. Deep expertise in developing Android Auto supported stacks. Integration experience with RemoteUI/Projection - Android Auto business logic application on Android platforms. Experience with Android 12 or later (desirable). Knowledge of Opensource Android frameworks, Android Auto plugin implementation, and porting. Competencies in software development, architecture, configuration management, integration, and validation for Realtime, embedded, concurrent applications in the automotive field.

title: Storage Engineer
description:
Genpact (NYSE: G) is a global professional services and solutions firm delivering outcomes that shape the future. Our 125,000+ people across 30+ countries are driven by our innate curiosity, entrepreneurial agility, and desire to create lasting value for clients. Powered by our purpose – the relentless pursuit of a world that works better for people – we serve and transform leading enterprises, including the Fortune Global 500, with our deep business and industry knowledge, digital operations services, and expertise in data, technology, and AI.

Welcome to the relentless pursuit of better.

Inviting applications for the role of

Lead

Consultant – Storage

Responsibilities: Storage: Primary NetApp Storage Cluster-Mode Administration. Experience with monitoring and performance tuning of NetApp AFF & FAS Arrays. Experience with capacity planning and storage allocation forecasting. Working Experience on NetApp Snap Center , Storage Grid , Active IQ, Grafana Harvest. Working experience on NetApp Code upgrades. Knowledge on VMware vCenter administration. Knowledge on DELL-EMC ECS. Working Experience on Brocade/CISCO SAN Switches and zoning. Working with an enterprise wide, Disaster-Recovery environment. Understanding of Linux and Windows Operating Systems. Proficiency in PowerShell scripting and automations. Actively and pre-emptively determine possible faults and causes by the execution of pre-determined health and operational checks. Interactions with all levels of the organization and with external clients and Vendors. Ability to plan and prioritize work and meet project deadlines. Must be self-motivated and work well with other groups. Excellent communication skills (oral and written), interpersonal, and organizational skills are required. Having Good Knowledge on scripting. Having hands on experience on any cloud platforms and automations. Backup: Experience in managing Avamar & Power Protect Data Manager (PPDM ) Data Protection Environments. Hands-on experience on EMC Data Domain Administration. Working knowledge on NDMP backups . Analyze backup software performance and monitoring of scheduled backups to ensure success or take remedial action for failures. Configure backup policy for new backup clients. Manage and resolve Data restore requirements.

Qualifications we seek in you! Minimum Qualifications / Skills Bachelor’s degree in business information systems (IS), computer science or related field, or equivalent-related IT experience. 8 + years of experience in storage and backup administration

Plusses: Experience with GCP PubSub Retail industry experience

Key Responsibilities: A large retailer headquartered in the US is seeking an Integration Engineer to join their team remotely. A qualified individual will have experience with software integration using Java/Sprint Boot as well as database interactions with SQL/PostgreSQL in the cloud.

Additional responsibilities include: Design, develop, and maintain robust software integrations using Java and Spring Boot Implement and optimize database interactions with SQL/PostgreSQL Develop and manage event-driven architectures using Kafka or GCP PubSub Create and maintain comprehensive test suites, including unit tests, contract tests, API component tests Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand and translate business requirements into technical solutions Architect and implement cloud-based integration solutions in GCP or equivalent cloud environments

Compensation: $18/hr to $25/hr USD.

Exact compensation may vary based on several factors, including skills, experience, and education.

title: ´´SR Golang Developer #957687``
description:
Quem Somos A Dexian, lançada em 2023, tem presença global e traz consigo quase 30 anos de experiência através de suas companhias legadas, principalmente da combinação da DISYS e Signature Consultants.

Iniciamos no Brasil 2007 como DISYS e, de lá para cá, conquistamos mais de 60 clientes de diferentes setores da economia. Como Dexian, passamos a ser uma das maiores empresas de soluções de staffing, soluções de TI e complementação de força de trabalho. Estamos liderando a indústria por meio de entrega de serviços exclusivos que combina escala global, projetos de serviço completo e agilidade tática para modernizar modelos de contratação. Apoiamos nossos clientes para encontrar a melhor maneira que seu gap de talentos seja endereçado, de maneira a suportar seu porcesso de transformação digital. Contamos com escritórios estrategicamente localizados em quatro grandes capitais: Curitiba (PR), Porto Alegre (RS), Rio de Janeiro (RJ) e São Paulo (SP). Assim, conseguimos nos manter próximos dos nossos clientes e consultores. Também somos uma Minority Owner Company e nos sentimos orgulhosos de termos nascido na diversidade.

O que esperar de nós Pessoas estão no centro de nossa estratégia e compõem o nosso maior capital. Temos compromisso de atrair, reter os melhores talentos e construir conexões reais para a vida. Por isso, atuamos como ponte entre profissionais altamente qualificados e oportunidades consistentes e prósperas. Acreditamos que, trazer o talento, a tecnologia e as organizações certas juntos, ajuda a desbloquear resultados transformadores e alcançar novos níveis de sucessos para os clientes que atendemos e os consultores que contratamos. E para isso, cinco valores fundamentais nos guiam: Integridade, Transparência, Autenticidade, Engenhosidade e Empatia. A Dexian está comprometida com a responsabilidade social corporativa e, investe em programas que apoiam a diversidade e inclusão.

Se você compartilha dos mesmos valores, aqui é seu lugar!

Atividades: Desenvolver e implementar APIs backend usando Go Criar e gerenciar templates Go para otimização de código Manter e atualizar o código existente em Go e Java Utilizar sistemas de controle de versão como Git e Azure para gerenciar o código Configurar e gerenciar pipelines de CI/CD com GitHub Actions e Spinnaker Escrever scripts automatizados para testes unitários e de integração Analisar e resolver problemas técnicos de forma eficiente Colaborar com a equipe para garantir a qualidade e consistência do código Realizar revisão de código e fornecer feedback técnico Comunicar-se de forma clara e eficaz com a equipe sobre o progresso e desafios técnicos

O que você precisa ter: Inglês Avançado ou Fluente para conversação e escrita Experiência no desenvolvimento de APIs backend usando GO Conhecimento de Go templating, frameworks comuns e ferramentas Proficiência em programação Go Conhecimento de Java Fortes habilidades analíticas Experiência com sistemas de controle de versão, como Git e Azure Experiência com ferramentas de CI/CD, como GitHub Actions e Spinnaker Experiência na criação de scripts automatizados para testes unitários e de integração Excelentes habilidades de comunicação escrita e verbal Colaboração com outros para garantir implantações de código consistentes e confiáveis

Onde você vai trabalhar? No conforto da sua casa. Regime 100% Home Office.

title: Sales Development Representative
description:
We are

TITAN

, a leading

global SaaS startup

in the

Salesforce ecosystem . Our products redefine digital engagement on the Salesforce platform using a no-code, web-based platform.

We are currently looking for an exceptional

Sales Development Representative

to join our expanding Sales team. As an SDR at TITAN, you will play a pivotal role as the company's face to potential customers. Your primary responsibility will be to initiate communication and build professional relationships with prospects, ultimately generating new business for the company.

Responsibilities Conduct thorough market research to identify target industries, accounts, and untapped prospects. Navigate Salesforce to pull account lists to re-engage stale leads, returning them to a sales cycle. Master our Ideal Customer Profile and proactively source companies to expand our outreach. Employ a blend of traditional communication methods, prospecting tools, and social platforms to connect with and target new prospects. Schedule and lead introductory calls with the leads you generate. You will work alongside an Account Executive to identify client needs and business problems using proven sales methodologies. Ensure that qualified leads progress from your pipeline to an Account Executive's pipeline, advancing the customer journey and buying process.

Qualifications: At least

2 years of experience

in a similar role in a

SaaS

company - mandatory. Positive attitude, beyond excellent people skills, and the ability to work in a team environment, talking with all levels and connecting with key decision-makers. Good sense of technology and quick learner. Willingness to make many phone calls and proactive approaches to potential clients. Flexibility to work remotely in different time zones. Fluent

English. Social media experience, including

and

Navigator - is an advantage. Salesforce Admin certification

or equivalent tech experience - a huge advantage.

Why Join

TITAN ? Be part of an energetic and forward-thinking team in a fast-paced SaaS startup. Engage with top-tier clients and immerse yourself in the latest industry innovations. Benefit from the flexibility of remote work and maintain a fulfilling work-life integration. Receive a competitive salary and opportunities for career advancement and skill development.

title: Profissional de Engenharia de Dados - SAP Pleno
description:
Código da vaga: 44490

Sobre a BRQ Digital

Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.

Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.

BRQ WAY

No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!

É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.

Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.

Ei #fera em engenharia de dados, estamos ampliando nossa operação internacional, precisamos de você!

- O que procuramos?

Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!

- O que você deve ter?

Experiência de 2+ anos em migração de dados ETL, incluindo extração, limpeza, perfilamento, transformação, carregamento, validação e remediação de vários sistemas legados de origem para sistemas de destino. Experiência prática no desenvolvimento de consultas SQL complexas, conhecimento de SAP ECC, SAP S/4 Hana, CRM, Salesforce, Snowflake, Dataiku ou PowerBI são altamente preferidos. Compreensão sólida de estratégias/metodologia de migração, estratégias de validação e planejamento de simulação para desenvolver entregáveis de migração sólidos. Inglês avançado para atuação em projetos internacionais.

- O que temos pra te oferecer?

Mais do que um plano de carreira ! A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares: Carreira técnica:

Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos! Carreira de Liderança:

Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos. Experiência internacional:

Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede. Empreendedorismo:

De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.

- E os benefícios?

Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Home Office; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais! - Como é trabalhar na BRQ?

Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions

Curtiu? Então inscreva-se e venha para o melhor da Transformação Digital com a gente!

title: Automation Anywhere Senior RPA Developer
description:
Practia is present in 7 countries, leading automation and digital transformation projects for major clients.

We are one of the most prestigious business and technology companies in Latin America, with a specialized methodology and technical team in automation and Hyperautomation.

We have partnerships and certifications with leading market platforms, acting as a Diamond Partner with UiPath, Platinum Partner with Automation Anywhere, Gold Partner with Microsoft, and Silver Partner with IBM. Our experience and expertise in automation services have earned us, among various awards, the USN (UiPath Service Network) badge and UiPath's LATAM Partner of the Year award. We are looking for a

Senior RPA Developer with expertise in the Automation Anywhere 360

platform to support us in a strategic project alongside a team of analysts and developers. This person will be involved in the entire RPA development cycle, starting from reviewing the functional documentation, defining development complexity, providing support for solution design and architecture, developing the automation, and supporting testing phases, automation deploy in production and hypercare. They will be trained in our exclusive development framework and Hyperautomation methodology, SmartBPA®, which spans from Discovery to COE implementation. As a key contributor to the

Intelligent Automation Program , you will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including business analysts, solution architects, and IT professionals, to automate complex business processes while ensuring high-quality, maintainable, and secure automation solutions.

What are we looking for? A person with seniority, experience and expertise in automation development. A person with a consultative and collaborative approach. A person who enjoys working in an environment that fosters competence, transparency, and trust.

Roles and Responsibilities:

Degree in Technology, Engineering, or Administration. Experience in automation development with Automation Anywhere platform (Minimum of 5 years). Automation Anywhere 360 Advanced and Master certifications. Design, develop, deploy and sustain end-to-end automation solutions using Automation Anywhere A360. Build and maintain reusable bot components Integrate GenAI/ML, IDP, and APIs into automation workflows for enhanced functionality. Work closely with the Solution Architect to ensure best practices, security, and compliance in automation solutions.

Job Requirements Hands-on experience integrating RPA solutions with APIs, databases, and enterprise applications. Proficiency in scripting languages such as Python, VBScript or JavaScript. Experience in design, develop and debug complex automation workflows and implement robust error-handling mechanisms. Experience in integrating GenAI, ML and IDP into intelligent automation solutions Queue management. Development of standardized documentation (PDD and SDD). Use of frameworks. Experience with Agile methodology, mainly using Scrum and Kanban. Fluent in English.

Knowledge that may be a differential for the position: Knowledge of cloud platforms services like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Knowledge of Automation Anywhere IA Agents, IA Studio, Enterprise Knowledge and Document Automation products. Other certifications and trainings in the intelligent automation field.

title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER JUNIOR - .NET | EXCLUSIVA PARA PESSOA COM DEFICIÊNCIA
description:
LOCALIZA&CO Somos uma empresa presente no futuro. Em nossa história, sempre trouxemos para o agora ideias que pareciam existir somente anos à frente. Enxergamos o amanhã pelas lentes do nosso espírito empreendedor e pela nossa paixão pelos clientes.

Construir o futuro da mobilidade é o nosso propósito. É ele que estimula nossa habilidade de protagonizar com talento e inovação para oferecer a melhor experiência de mobilidade aos que contam com a Localiza no seu caminho. Para cumprir o nosso propósito, precisamos de gente que inspira e transforma, com atitude de ousadia e protagonismo. Juntos, criaremos soluções inteligentes de ir e vir para nossos clientes fazendo da mobilidade do futuro, o nosso presente.

Buscamos excelência nas nossas entregas e somos comprometidos com a sustentabilidade e com o nosso papel de empresa cidadã, o que nos faz crescer e gerar valor ao nosso negócio. Contamos com um time de alta performance, que é apaixonado pelo cliente e tem prazer em servir com simpatia para cultivar longos relacionamentos. Queremos que você faça parte disso! Nos ajude a fazer com que a Localiza e o LocalizaLabs seja ainda mais DIVERSO e INCLUSIVO, evoluindo a nossa cultura e o nosso jeito de ser. Vem viver a experiência de ser Localiza com a gente!

O QUE VOCÊ IRÁ FAZER COMO

SOFTWARE DEVELOPER Escrever e manter código em .NET, seguindo as melhores práticas; Implementar funcionalidades e correções de bugs; Criar e executar testes unitários para garantir a qualidade do código; Estar disposto a aprender novas tecnologias e conceitos; Investigar e solucionar problemas técnicos; Pedir ajuda quando necessário e aprender com os erros; Participar ativamente do ciclo e ritos de entregas ágeis de software (reuniões diárias, dailies, refinamentos, sprint reviews, retrospectivas etc.)

O QUE PRECISAMOS Experiência sólida em desenvolvimento backend utilizando a plataforma .NET, com foco na linguagem C#; Desenvolvimento de APIs RESTful e conhecimento em práticas de integração de serviços; Bancos de Dados Relacionais e Não Relacionais e ORMs; Conhecimento em bancos de dados como SQL Server, Sybase e MongoDB; Familiaridade com frameworks de persistência, como Entity Framework e Dapper; Experiência com metodologias ágeis, como SCRUM e/ou Kanban; Microsserviços e Contêineres; Familiaridade com uso de contêineres (Docker) e orquestração (Kubernetes).

BENEFÍCIOS DESSA POSIÇÃO Participação nos Lucros; Auxílio Home Office; Vale Alimentação; Vale Refeição; Convênio Médico; Convênio Odontológico; Gympass; Previdência Privada; Allya; Acesso ilimitado a diversos cursos da nossa Universidade Localiza; Programas internos de treinamento e desenvolvimento; Desconto em compra e aluguel de veículos.

title: Business Development Representative
description:

to join our dynamic sales team. The BDR will be responsible for generating new business opportunities, identifying potential clients, and driving revenue growth. This role requires strong communication skills, resilience, and a passion for sales.

Key Responsibilities Lead Generation & Prospecting

– Identify and reach out to potential customers through cold calling, emails, networking, and social media. Qualifying Leads

A proactive approach with a results-driven mindset. Fluent in Portuguese

title: Frontend Developer
description:
When you think of InComm Payments, think of Innovative Payments Technology. We were founded over 30 years ago and continue to be a pioneer in the payment (FinTech) industry. Since our inception, we have grown to be a team of over 3,000 employees in 35 countries around the world. We own over 400 global technical patents and a network that includes over 525,000 points of retail distribution that points to our industry expertise.

We are creating nearly 200

Fully Remote

jobs in Brazil for various financial technology (Fintech) engineering, database, development, and testing teams.

Responsibilities

Design and develop high-quality software solutions using Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML5 Mobile-first, Mobile-responsive design Create and maintain RESTful APIs, ensuring high performance and responsiveness. Ability to work with our product owners and subject matter experts at the highest levels, technical and non-technical. Ability to read existing code and contribute to product enhancements, critical fixes, and performance improvements. Participate in development efforts on a cross-functional product team in an agile environment. Collaborate on a tight-knit agile team, participate in daily stand-ups, estimating/planning, and retrospectives. Support testers, product teams, and customer-facing teams with troubleshooting assistance Examine failures and facilitate continuous improvement efforts within and across teams. Provide value wherever possible, be driven to get things done.

Qualifications

5+ years of experience in front-end development, with a strong focus on Angular (version 2+). Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), and TypeScript. Hands-on experience with RESTful APIs and integrating front-end with back-end services. Expertise in responsive design and CSS frameworks (Bootstrap, Material Design). Familiarity with modern JavaScript build tools and bundlers (Webpack, npm, etc.). Ability to write unit and integration tests using Jasmine or Karma. Experience with NgRx or similar state management libraries. Knowledge of front-end testing frameworks like Protractor or Cypress. Experience with CI/CD pipelines, version control (Git), and agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban)

title: Senior Database Administrator (Postgresql) (Remote Brazil)
description:
Project Description: The primary goal of the project is the modernization, maintenance and development of an eCommerce platform for a big US-based retail company, serving millions of omnichannel customers each week.

Solutions are delivered by several Product Teams focused on different domains - Customer, Loyalty, Search and Browse, Data Integration, Cart.

Current overriding priorities are new brands onboarding, re-architecture, database migrations, migration of microservices to a unified cloud-native solution without any disruption to business.

Responsibilities: We are looking for a Database Administrator with experience of managing PostgreSQL in a cloud, who can help to tune performance of client platform: - Quickly onboard to Customer's processes - Performance tuning on request - DBA work with Incident tickets - Collaborate with other teams and client to find the best solutions

Mandatory Skills Description: • Readiness to work until 9.00 pm CET (no need to do overtimes); • Excellent skills in Postgres tuning with and without tools and plugins / extensions • Strong experience managing PostgreSQL in any of the cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP) • Advanced knowledge of SQL Queries, Joins, functions and procedures • Networking, Infra components, Postgres settings and flags • Monitoring tools and usage of analyzing workloads and query bench marks measurements for applications • Strong written and verbal communication skills

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: • Experience of work with Azure • Certifications in AWS, GCP, or Azure database management • DevOps and GitHub • Experience of work in distributed teams, with US customers

title: Senior C/C++ engineer with Linux
description:
Project Description: Founded in 1984, our client is one of the world's leading provider of lithography systems for the semiconductor industry, manufacturing complex machines that are critical to the production of integrated circuits or chips.

The client has its R&D and manufacturing operations in The Netherlands. Luxoft is currently searching to augment the Development & Engineering Department with a talented software engineer to design and implement embedded software for systems among the highest precision ever produced in the world. The collaboration with our client has reached the 10 years threshold and we have more than 300 talented colleagues working alongside the client.

Responsibilities: As a software engineer, you will be working on Linux server applications for metrology components and on complex algorithms application software. You will be working with electrical engineers, mechatronic engineers and system engineers to define the software requirements.

After your SW design is approved you are responsible for implementing the design in Python & C for new modules. Auto and unit testers are written in Python. During the testing phase, you will collect the necessary data so you can write a test report. This test report is then reviewed and when it is approved your software will be released.

The development environment is Red Hat Linux, execution environment is Wind River Linux. The software release driving a client machine is 40 million lines of code. Client SW teams work in various modes such as Agile and SAFE.

Mandatory Skills Description: C/C++: application coding (C language 70%) Linux (one of more of the following): familiar with command line tools, makefile, git, shell and python scripting Embedded C and C++: understanding and maintaining legacy code. Adding new features while keeping compliance with established architecture. Version control using command line is also required - Git, Clear Case and SVN, in this order of priority. • Bachelor or Master with an education in Computer Science, Informatics or equivalent

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: Willing to learn/improve Python skills Agile mindset

Languages: English: B2 Upper Intermediate

title: SAP S4 Functional Consultant DRC NFe Expert
description:
About the job

We are seeking an experienced SAP DRC NFE (Document and Reporting Compliance - Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) Expert to lead the successful implementation of SAP DRC for e-invoicing and tax compliance. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in SAP DRC functionalities, integration with tax authorities, and project management in compliance-heavy environments. English fluency is mandatory for effective communication across global teams and stakeholders.

In this role you will:

• Lead the end-to-end implementation of SAP DRC NFE projects, including requirement gathering, configuration, testing, and deployment. • Customize and optimize SAP DRC solutions to ensure seamless electronic invoicing (e-NFE) compliance in Brazil or other supported jurisdictions. • Ensure accurate integration of SAP DRC with external systems, including government tax portals and legacy systems. • Provide subject matter expertise on local tax regulations and compliance requirements for e-invoicing. • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure timely project delivery and minimal business disruption. • Identify risks and proactively develop mitigation strategies during the project lifecycle. • Conduct user training, support issue resolution, and provide go-live assistance. • Maintain documentation for processes, configurations, and project changes.

Required Qualifications:

• Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Business, or related field. • 5+ years of experience in SAP projects, with a focus on SAP DRC/NFE implementations. • Proven expertise in e-invoicing processes, compliance, and integration with government tax systems. • Strong knowledge of SAP modules, including SD, MM, FI, and their integration with SAP DRC. • Hands-on experience with system configuration, troubleshooting, and performance optimization. • Fluent in English (both written and spoken); additional languages are a plus. • Excellent communication, problem-solving, and stakeholder management skills.

Preferred Skills:

• Knowledge of Brazilian tax regulations and compliance. • Experience with other SAP compliance tools (e.g., SAP ACR, SAP GRC).

Language:

Advance English

title: Full Stack/Platform Developer
description:
Full Stack/Platform Engineer for Fast Growing SaaS

Smarter Contact is a rapidly growing SaaS company at the forefront of revolutionizing customer engagement. Our cutting-edge platform empowers businesses to connect with their customers in meaningful ways, utilizing the latest technologies to enhance communication, streamline processes, and drive overall customer satisfaction.

We seek a skilled Platform Engineer to join our engineering team and help build robust internal tools and systems, such as admin panels, database report engine, config servers, and 3rd party integrations (including CRMs) that enhance our development and operations capabilities. This role will be crucial in developing and maintaining the infrastructure that powers our engineering efficiency.

Key Responsibilities: Design and implement internal DevOps tools and automation systems Develop and maintain configuration management systems for multiple environments Create and maintain simulation environments for third-party integrations Build and improve developer productivity tools and extensions Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand and address platform needs Contribute to the architecture and design of internal tools and systems Implement monitoring, logging, and observability solutions Create a layered permissions Admin Panel to automate common support requests Create a reporting framework to query system data for financial and operational reports

Technical Requirements: Strong experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services and best practices Proficient in TypeScript and modern JavaScript development Experience building and maintaining Chrome extensions Strong SQL knowledge and experience with database optimization Experience with GraphQL API development and integration Expertise in developing simulation/mock environments for third-party APIs Knowledge of DevOps practices and tools Experience with configuration management and environment variable handling Familiarity with API integration patterns (REST, GraphQL, WebHooks)

Qualifications: 7+ years of software engineering experience, with at least 2 years in platform or tooling engineering Proven track record of building internal developer tools and automation systems Strong understanding of software development lifecycle and CI/CD practices Experience with communication APIs (e.g., Twilio) Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail Strong communication skills and ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams

Nice to Have: Experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) Knowledge of containerization and orchestration technologies Background in SaaS or cloud-native applications Experience with monitoring and observability tools Experience with CRM platform integrations, ideally Hubspot

We are looking for someone passionate about building tools that empower developers and improve engineering efficiency. If you enjoy creating solutions that make development workflows smoother and more reliable, we'd love to hear from you.

title: DevOps - SRE (Site Reliability Engineering)
description:
Description

Important Information Location:

Brazil Job Mode:

Full-time Work Mode:

Work from home

Job Summary Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) is a discipline that incorporates aspects of software engineering and applies them to infrastructure and operations problems. The main goals are to create scalable and highly reliable software systems.

Responsibilities and Duties Utilize software tools and automated tasks for continuous monitoring and reliability of applications; Act swiftly in response to emergency situations impacting system reliability in production environments, performing root cause analysis for on-going incidents; Oversee and streamline change management processes to enhance system performance and reliability. Ownership of releases to production environments; Work closely with development teams throughout the software lifecycle, with a focus on contributing to solving system-related issues and eliminating toil - automating routine tasks for enhanced productivity; Focus on the reliability and scalability of systems, ensuring high performance and efficiency standards.

Essential Skills Proficiency in monitoring tools like Azure Monitoring, App Insights, Prometheus, Grafana. Project tracking and version management with tools like JIRA, SVN, GitHub; Expertise with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, ARM/Bicep, Pulumi, etc.) and release management tooling (ArgoCD, Harness, Octopus, etc.); Experience in incident alert tools (PageDuty, Opsgenie), and container orchestration tools like Kubernetes, AKS and similar.

About Encora

Encora is the preferred digital engineering and modernization partner of some of the world’s leading enterprises and digital native companies. With over 9,000 experts in 47+ offices and innovation labs worldwide, Encora’s technology practices include Product Engineering & Development, Cloud Services, Quality Engineering, DevSecOps, Data & Analytics, Digital Experience, Cybersecurity, and AI & LLM Engineering.

At Encora, we hire professionals based solely on their skills and qualifications, and do not discriminate based on age, disability, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or nationality.

title: Supply Chain - Administrative
description:
We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented

Supply Chain Administrator

to support warehousing, logistics, fleet management, and data auditing operations. This role will serve as the primary point of contact for third-party logistics (3PL) providers, manage invoice tracking, and ensure data accuracy across multiple platforms. The ideal candidate must be able to work in

Central Time

and have access to

VoIP, Slack, and Gmail

for communication. This position reports directly to the

Supply Chain Manager . Key Responsibilities: Serve as the primary point of contact for third-party logistics (3PL) providers. Respond to emails regarding system support, shipment tracking, and general inquiries. Schedule and coordinate dock appointments for warehouses. Audit receipts, incomplete shipments, and warehouse records to ensure accuracy. Track and categorize invoices (e.g., handling, storage) for proper cost allocation. Review and audit

Warehouse Glove (WG) invoices

for accuracy. Manage freight quotes and coordinate shipments to optimize costs and efficiency. Audit fleet management platforms ( WEX, Geotab, Samba ) to ensure records are up to date and driver information is synchronized. Process and file fleet-related invoices, ensuring correct breakdown of umbrella invoices. Assist in accident claim processing and related administrative tasks. Analyze unit

exit inspection data

to identify high cost items requiring attention. Recommend maintenance strategies and cost-effective solutions to the

Operations Associate

based on

maintenance guideline decks

to minimize unnecessary replacements. Requirements: Experience in supply chain administration, logistics, or related fields. Strong organizational skills with high attention to detail. Fluent English Proficiency in data auditing, invoice tracking, and logistics coordination. Ability to work in 8- 5pm

BRT Time zone Proficiency in

VoIP (3cx), Slack, and Gmail

for communication. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

title: Senior Amazon Account Manager
description:
About the Role: We are looking for an experienced

Senior Amazon Catalog Manager

to manage and optimize large-scale Amazon catalogs with efficiency and precision. This role is focused on backend catalog operations, ensuring seamless product listings, compliance, and troubleshooting issues. The ideal candidate is an Amazon flat file expert with experience handling thousands of SKUs efficiently while utilizing automation tools to streamline workflows.

Key Responsibilities: Build, update, and optimize Amazon catalogs using flat files (bulk uploads, variation listings, and troubleshooting errors). Large-Scale Implementation: Handle large catalogs with thousands of SKUs, ensuring accuracy, efficiency, and compliance with Amazon’s policies. Error Troubleshooting & Reinstatements: Identify and resolve listing errors, handle ASIN reinstatements, and manage parent-child relationships effectively. Amazon Compliance & Policies: Ensure product listings comply with Amazon’s US marketplace policies, avoiding violations and listing suppression. Automation & Optimization: Leverage automation tools like Excel (Macros), Python, or Amazon APIs to improve catalog efficiency and accuracy.

Requirements: Proven experience managing large-scale Amazon catalogs using flat files. Strong understanding of Amazon backend operations, compliance, and troubleshooting. Ability to efficiently handle bulk uploads, listing variations, and reinstatement. Experience working with automation tools (Excel Macros, Python, Amazon APIs preferred). Detail-oriented with a strong problem-solving mindset. Comfortable working independently in a remote setting.

Schedule:

Part-time (20 hours/week) Initially. Full-time transition if performing well.

Start Date:

April 1st / 15th

What We Offer:

Flexible schedule (20 hours/week to start, with potential for full-time transition). Work with a dynamic team in a growing e-commerce environment. Opportunity to scale processes and implement automation in Amazon catalog management.

Big enough to deliver – small enough to care. #VempraGFT #VamosVoarJuntos #ProudToBeGFT

title: Content Specialist
description:
Job description

Role The Influencer & Content Specialist plays a vital role in securing influencer partnerships and podcast opportunities for clients, ensuring strategic outreach, relationship building, and campaign execution. This role ensures every client is matched with influencers and podcasts aligned with their brand, fostering strong relationships, and optimizing processes. Success is measured through consistent outreach results, efficient campaign management, and high client satisfaction.

Responsibilities Influencer Outreach & Campaign Management Build targeted influencer lists weekly per client/subscriber to align with brand values and objectives. Send initial outreach emails to potential influencers. Conduct follow-ups to potential influencer collaborators. Ensure all influencers are onboarded with correct brand guidelines and expectations. Confirm and track influencer posting schedules. Send influencers tailored information about the client/brand messaging. Communicate with clients aligning the strategy and delivery of each influencer content. Podcast Outreach & Scheduling Maintain client profiles on outreach platforms. Pitch clients to podcasts weekly. Send messages daily to podcast hosts. Conduct follow ups and schedule recording sessions of podcasts. Communicate with clients aligning the strategy and recording of each podcast session. Process Execution & Tracking Update internal trackers daily and provide reports on a weekly basis. Maintain detailed influencer and podcast contact databases. Track influencer product deliveries and follow up on planned posting schedules. Ensure all collaborations and partnerships are documented accurately. Content & Relationship Management Foster long-term relationships with influencers and podcast hosts for recurring opportunities. Gather feedback from clients and influencers to optimize future campaigns. Reporting & Communication Submit daily and weekly reports on outreach performance and campaign success. Deliver comprehensive monthly reports analyzing campaign impact. Share timely updates with clients, team members, and publicists. Results Meet or exceed outreach targets for influencers and podcasts. Secure and confirm podcast placements and influencer collaborations promptly. Develop long-term relationships with influencers and podcast hosts. Track and analyze performance for continuous campaign improvement. Ensure transparent reporting and process optimization for efficiency and scalability. Requirements Ability to manage multiple outreach platforms and campaigns simultaneously. Strong attention to detail in documentation and execution. Professional and engaging written and verbal communication with influencers, podcast hosts, and clients. Ability to foster trust and rapport for long-term partnerships. Proactively seek feedback and apply it for process and campaign improvements. Respond to all communications within 24 hours. Meet deadlines for outreach, follow-ups, and scheduling. Ensure timely report submissions. Maintain accuracy in tracking outreach, scheduling, and reporting. Monitor campaign execution and share relevant details with clients. Work closely with the team to achieve collective goals. Contribute to a proactive and positive work environment. This position pays $630 USD on a monthly basis.

Job Type: Full-time

Language: English (Required)

title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description:
A

Jusfy

está em busca de um

Senior FullStack Developer

para compor o time! Somos uma startup jurídica que busca constantemente soluções para facilitar a vida dos advogados e advogadas brasileiros. Atuamos na área de tecnologia, desenvolvendo produtos e ferramentas que auxiliam na produtividade diária dos nossos clientes. Somos uma empresa jovem e muito promissora. Alcançamos resultados expressivos de crescimento nos últimos anos e sabemos que temos ainda muito mais para conquistar. Buscamos profissionais que queiram fazer parte dessa trajetória junto conosco!

Responsabilidades: Desenvolver novas funcionalidades utilizando ReactJS e APIs RESTful, utilizando Node.js, Express e NestJs; Escrever códigos limpos, de alta qualidade e fácil manutenção seguindo as boas práticas de desenvolvimento; Trabalhar em estreita colaboração com equipes de produto, design e operações para definir requisitos e entregar soluções eficazes; Participar ativamente em discussões de arquitetura e tecnologias; Realizar code reviews, ajudando outros desenvolvedores a melhorar a qualidade do código; Garantir que a documentação do código e arquitetura esteja sempre atualizada.

Requisitos técnicos: Vivência com desenvolvimento de Backend e Frontend; Experiência em Typescript e API REST; Experiência com desenvolvimento de CI/CD utilizando github actions; Conhecimento em bancos de dados relacionais e não-relacionais; Orquestração de containers (Docker e docker-compose); Conhecimento em Styled Components e Context API; Experiência com controle de versão utilizando Git; Prática em Domain-Driven Design (DDD) e aplicação de padrões como CQRS e Clean Architecture; Conhecimento de cloud AWS.

Desejável: Experiência com metodologias ágeis; Experiência em times de desenvolvimento de software ou empresas de tecnologia; Conhecimento em testes automatizados e ferramentas de integração contínua; Conhecimento de Design Patterns; Experiência com micro frontends. Habilidade para trabalhar em equipe e boa comunicação; Boa habilidade de resolução de problemas e pensamento crítico.

Oferecemos: Cartão flexível de benefícios. Rotina remota de trabalho; Ambiente de trabalho descontraído e inovador; Oportunidade de trabalhar em projetos desafiadores e com grande impacto.

title: Administrator Middleware Oracle WebLogic
description:
Our Opportunity.

We are expanding our team and looking for an

Oracle WebLogic Administrator

who shares our passion for technological challenges.

If you're seeking a collaborative environment and growth opportunities, this could be your chance! Join us!

• Remote work – international project • Hiring under CLT (Brazilian labor laws).

We are looking at

Oracle WebLogic Administrator

who will be responsible for deploying and supporting middleware applications using Oracle WebLogic products. The ideal candidate will have a minimum 5 years of experience with middleware administration in a large enterprise environment with a focus on WebLogic.

Responsibilities: • Oracle WebLogic Software installation and Maintenance (11.x, 12.x and 14.x versions) • Installing WebLogic patches, service packs etc. • WebLogic Application server administration. • Performance monitoring and tuning - Basic • Carrying out Thread Dump Analysis, Heap dump analysis etc. • Configuring of LDAP and Security realms - Basic • Developing automation scripts. • Applying utilities like WebLogic.Admin, WebLogic.Deployer etc. • Integrating with HTTP servers. • Troubleshooting of JAR, EAR, WAR etc.

Requirements: • Advanced English for conversation. • 5+ years hands on experience in Linux/Unix Administration. • 3+ Years experience in OCI Administration - Tenancy , VCN, Compartments, Network Layers, handling firewalls, subnet, storage options, FSS, Block Volume, Object storage. • OCI infra-administration (Install, configure, migrations, tuning, patching, administration monitoring). • Hands on experience in writing and modifying Terraform scripts for application deployments on OCI and for managing OCI Infrastructure. • Hands on experience performance tuning, hardware upgrades, and resource optimization as required. Configure CPU, memory, and disk partitions as required and ensure high availability of infrastructure. • Experience in Application of OS patches and upgrades on a regular basis and upgrade administrative tools and utilities. Configure/add new services as necessary. • Experience on EXADATA Infrastructure patching on EXACC is added advantage. • Understanding or experience on Tanium Tool is an added advantage. • Experience on Handling OS related or Application related security vulnerabilities is an added advantage. • Exposure to using code repository like GIT. • Hands on Experience with provisioning storage, compute nodes, network. and understanding requirements for the same. • Experience with Ansible and YAML syntax. • Experience in Handling Certificate renewals on OCI. • Understanding and hands on experience of HA architecture in an OCI environment. • Strong understanding of HA concepts in DR and setting up on Infrastructure for DR Site. • Experience with IaaS solutions: virtual machines/networks, on-premise/hybrid cloud computing, cloud identity, security models, cloud monitoring, logging, local and cloud storage. • Should be well verse with ITIL based service delivery for Incident Management, Change Management, Problem Management, Capacity Management, Configuration Management. Get the future you want Through a diverse workforce that represents our society, we promote an inclusive culture, building a place where our talents are supported by transformational leaders and highly engaged teams. Through SejaVocê@Capgemini, we express our commitment to continually understanding the characteristics and interests that make each of our people unique. We take pride in our diversity and are committed to promoting an inclusive environment with equal opportunities. Our job openings are for all people, regardless of color, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, or disability. We are recognized by GPTW as a great place to work and one of the top 10 best companies for women to work in Brazil. Our commitment to Gender Equity has also been recognized by Bloomberg for the second consecutive year, and we are certified by Edge and Edge Plus, both focused on gender equity. Additionally, we are in our 11th consecutive year recognized by the Ethisphere Institute as one of the World’s Most Ethical Companies. Here, you can be who you are: The protagonist of your development with opportunities for learning, growth, and participation in challenging projects. Furthermore, we are committed to offering a competitive compensation and benefits package in the industry, recognizing individual and team skills and performance. Our offerings focus on your Physical, Emotional, Financial, and Family Well-Being. • Benefits Package: Medical Assistance, Telemedicine (Einstein Conecta), Dental Plan, Pharmacy Agreement, Access to physical and mental health platforms (Gympass and Equilibrium), Meal Voucher, Life Insurance, Private Pension, Home Office Support, Payroll Loans, Stock Participation Plan, Benefits Club, and much more! • Career Plan: Encourages your journey and development, providing clear visibility on career opportunities and the requirements needed for your next level. • Corporate University and Learning Hub: Here you build your own development path with dynamic and accelerated training. You will have free access to courses from high-level partners to enhance your technical and behavioral skills. You will also have access to recognized teaching platforms such as Harvard Manage Mentor, Coursera, Udemy, and Pluralsight. • Access to official certifications with our partners, such as: AI Breakthrough Award, AWS, Avasant, CDP “A” list, Ecovadis, Everest, Ethisphere, Gartner, IDC, Google, Microsoft, SAP, Salesforce, ServiceNow, and many more. • Through EF Education First (English Live Brasil): You will have access to an online platform with classes adapted to your level to develop your skills in the following languages: English, Spanish, French, and German. About Capgemini Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their businesses, harnessing the power of technology from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the rapidly evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering, and platforms. We have more than 360,000 professionals in over 50 countries. In 2023, the Group reported global revenues of €22.5 billion. We are guided daily by the purpose of unlocking human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future, and by our seven values: Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Freedom, Team Spirit, Modesty, and Fun. If you share the same values, this is the place for you!

title: iOS Developer
description:
We are looking for a iOS engineer to build discovery experiences that serve the Adoption mission within our native app on surfaces such as the feed, the community tab and the post page.

What you’ll Do ● Move fast while balancing quality. We can’t afford extensive processes, and we also can’t afford show-stopping bugs. We need people who can balance speed with quality while quickly building brand-new products. ● Contribute meaningfully to team strategy. We give everyone a seat at the table and encourage active participation in planning for the future. Don’t just come along for the ride. ● Communicate effectively, within the team and across disciplines. Work closely with product managers and designers to craft compelling user experiences. What we’re looking for ● 4+ years mobile development experience with multiple parts of the iOS stack. We develop with Swift. Experience with Combine or RxSwift is strongly preferred. Experience with Storekit framework, Texture, UIKit, or SwiftUI are nice to have, but not required. ● Ability to design and implement complex distributed systems operating under high load. ● Experience developing customer-facing public applications is preferred. ● Entrepreneurial spirit. On our team, everyone needs to act like a startup CEO. You must be self-directed, innovative, and biased towards action in fast-paced environments. You live to build new things and thrive in ambiguity and even failure.

● Excellent communication skills. You must be able to collaborate effectively with teams in a fully-remote environment, and discuss complex topics with technical and non-technical audiences.

title: Business Development and Account Manager
description:
We are looking for an Business Development and Account Manager (Brazil)

Description of work: We are looking for a Sales and Account Manager, responsible for Brazil, to create long-term, trusting relationships with our customers. The role is to oversee a portfolio of assigned customers, develop new business from existing clients and actively seek new sales opportunities. This position may require travel up to 30%.

Position Responsibilities · Serve as the lead point of contact for all customer account management matters, · Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships, · Develop new business opportunities with present and new customers in dedicated region and create new opportunities based on an in-depth understanding of market potential, specific customer requirements and company capabilities, · Generate sales revenue with existing customers in line with the organization objectives and goals, · Negotiate contracts and close agreements to maximize profits, · Develop trusted advisor relationships with key accounts, customer stakeholders and partners, · Clearly communicate the progress of monthly/quarterly initiatives to internal and external stakeholders, · Present the business case for pursuing specific opportunities including profit potential, strategic advantage, competitive analysis and win probability, · Meet commitments within cost, schedule and performance parameters, · Adapt to changing business environment and priorities by complex problem solving and conflict resolution, · Undertake other duties/projects assigned.

Desired Skills and Experience · Relevant Work Experience: 5+ years either in Technical or Account/Sales related position where constant communication with external customers has been required · Business Understanding: Knowledge of the Airport/Ground Handler/Airline Industry · Ability to grasp the technology and product concepts to refer their value to customers · Demonstrable ability to communicate, present and influence key stakeholders at all levels of an organization, including executive and C-level

title: Analista de SEO pleno
description:
Estamos em busca de um(a) Analista de SEO Pleno para fazer parte do nosso time e nos ajudar a levar nossos projetos ao próximo nível!

Responsabilidades Realizar auditorias técnicas completas em sites, identificando oportunidades de melhorias em estrutura, performance e acessibilidade. Planejar e implementar estratégias de SEO on-page, incluindo otimização de conteúdo, meta tags, headings e arquitetura da informação. Monitorar, analisar e reportar métricas de SEO, utilizando ferramentas como Google Analytics e Search Console. Colaborar com equipes internas e externas (desenvolvedores, redatores, designers) para garantir a implementação correta das estratégias propostas. Manter-se atualizado(a) sobre os últimos updates dos algoritmos do Google e outras tendências de SEO, aplicando aprendizados nos projetos.

Qualificações Experiência comprovada em SEO, com histórico de resultados mensuráveis. Conhecimento avançado em SEO técnico, incluindo otimizações de velocidade, redirecionamentos, sitemap e robots.txt. Familiaridade com ferramentas de SEO, como SEMrush, Ahrefs, Screaming Frog, entre outras. Habilidade analítica para interpretar dados e desenvolver estratégias baseadas em insights. Competências sólidas de comunicação oral e escrita, com capacidade de apresentar resultados e alinhar expectativas com stakeholders.

Fazer parte do time Optimiza é ter pró-atividade, trabalhar bem em equipe, ter foco total no cliente e alto senso de responsabilidade com as entregas. Vem fazer parte do melhor time de SEO do Brasil!

title: Customer Relationship Management Developer
description:
About Ascendion Ascendion is a full-service digital engineering solutions company. We make and manage software platforms and products that power growth and deliver captivating experiences to consumers and employees. Our engineering, cloud, data, experience design, and talent solution capabilities accelerate transformation and impact for enterprise clients. Headquartered in New Jersey, our workforce of 6,000+ Ascenders delivers solutions from around the globe. Ascendion is built differently to engineer the next. Ascendion | Engineering to elevate life We have a culture built on opportunity, inclusion, and a spirit of partnership. Come, change the world with us: Build the coolest tech for world’s leading brands Solve complex problems – and learn new skills Experience the power of transforming digital engineering for Fortune 500 clients Master your craft with leading training programs and hands-on experience Experience a community of change makers! Join a culture of high-performing innovators with endless ideas and a passion for tech. Our culture is the fabric of our company, and it is what makes us unique and diverse. The way we share ideas, learning, experiences, successes, and joy allows everyone to be their best at Ascendion. About the Role:

Job Title : CRM Developer OR 365 MS Developer Locations: Costa Rica OR Argentina OR Brazil (Remote) Main Skill: 365 Dynamics, Azure , .net framework , C#

Job Summary:As a Senior MS Dynamics 365 Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing solutions within the Dynamics 365 environment. You will leverage your expertise in C# and your experience with the Azure Cloud platform to deliver robust and scalable solutions that meet our business needs. This role requires a high level of technical proficiency and the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams. Key Responsibilities: Design & Development: Design and develop custom solutions within the Dynamics 365 environment using C#, .NET and JavaScript .Integration: Implement and manage integrations with other systems and third-party applications using Azure services. Customization: Customize Dynamics 365 entities, workflows, and business processes to meet specific business requirements. Performance Optimization: Optimize the performance of Dynamics 365 applications and integrations.Technical Leadership: Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior developers and team members. Testing & Quality Assurance: Develop and execute unit tests and integration tests to ensure the quality and reliability of the solutions.Documentation: Create and maintain technical documentation for developed solutions and processes. Troubleshooting: Diagnose and resolve technical issues within the Dynamics 365 environment.Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in Dynamics 365, C#, and Azure to continuously improve the solutions and processes.·

Experience: 5+ years of experience in developing solutions within the MS Dynamics 365 environment.Strong proficiency in C# and .NET framework. Expertise in REST-style/Graph QL microservices, event-driven design patternsExperience with Azure Cloud services, including Azure Functions, Logic Apps, Service Bus, and other related services. Understanding in relational or NoSQL database technologies such as SQL Server, Oracle, PostgreSQL, or MongoDBUnderstanding of Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment and DevOps principlesFamiliarity with front-end technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Understanding of any cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, GCPUnderstanding of Azure service bus, Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS like messaging servicesGood to have experience in creating Plugins, Workflows and Custom Actions.Good to have experience in customizations and integrations within the rest of Microsoft EcosystemGood to have experience in large-scale enterprise applications and design patternsWork in an environment with a heavy emphasis on continuous integration and deployment strategies

Tell us about your experiences, education, and ambitions. Bring your knowledge, unique viewpoint, and creativity to the table. Let’s talk!

title: Coordenador Comercial (Farmer)
description:
Bem-vindo ao universo de experiências

Ingresse !

Somos uma empresa global de entretenimento e líder na América Latina, fornecendo tecnologia, soluções e insights para o setor de eventos. Acreditamos que o verdadeiro valor da vida está nas experiências que vivemos e nas histórias que compartilhamos. Nascemos do desejo de conectar pessoas a momentos inesquecíveis.

Nos despimos do senso comum e nos vestimos de curiosidade pelo novo e pelo desconhecido. Usamos nosso conhecimento em curadoria e tecnologia para trazer não apenas eventos que estão transformando a indústria e a vida das pessoas, mas também inovações para quebrar a mesmice.

Estamos presentes em tudo o que movimenta: o que se pode ver, ouvir, tocar, falar e sentir — da música ao esporte, e em tudo o que ainda não existe.

E estamos buscando um(a)

Coordenador Comercial (Farmer)

apaixonado(a) por criar relacionamentos duradouros, para somar com o nosso time de

Comercial .

Principais desafios:

Liderar a equipe de atendimento (Key Account), garantindo a solução estratégica e eficiente das demandas, promovendo a excelência no relacionamento com os clientes. Atuar diretamente no desenvolvimento profissional e pessoal da equipe, oferecendo suporte contínuo, feedbacks estruturados e incentivando a alta performance. Desenvolver, implementar e aprimorar ferramentas e processos que impulsionem a produtividade e otimizem os resultados da equipe. Apoiar a equipe na manutenção e retenção da carteira de clientes, assegurando o atingimento das metas de receita e satisfação dos clientes. Gerenciar e validar negociações contratuais, garantindo a renovação dos contratos dentro dos prazos estabelecidos e alinhados às diretrizes da empresa.

Quais as principais competências para a posição?

Experiência comprovada em liderança e gestão de equipes na área comercial e de atendimento. Visão estratégica orientada a resultados, com capacidade analítica para tomada de decisões assertivas. Conhecimento aprofundado sobre produtos, serviços e tendências do mercado de atuação. Habilidade para gestão de crises, mediação de conflitos e resolução ágil de problemas.

Modelo de atuação:

Modelo de contratação PJ, 2-3x por semana no escritório na região da Oscar Freire (SP).

Benefícios:

Vale Refeição; Auxílio Home Office; Gympass/Wellhub; Valor para custeio de plano de saúde SulAmérica. Férias remuneradas de 30 dias; Vale transporte; Day off de aniversário; Bônus de acordo com as metas da companhia de até: 5 salários ao ano.

Assim como todas as nossas vagas, esta também é voltada para a diversidade e inclusão. Independentemente de qualquer fator, perfil ou característica, venha ampliar sua carreira na Ingresse.

Para conhecer mais sobre a nossa missão, visão e valores, acesse o Sobre Nós:

.
