title: Educador Físico Prescritor de Treinos Online
description:
Descrição da Vaga – Educador Físico Prescritor de Treinos Online

Estamos em busca de um Educador Físico Prescritor de Treinos Online comprometido e apaixonado por transformar a vida dos nossos pacientes. Se você é organizado, analítico e possui um perfil motivador para cobrar, interagir e garantir resultados reais, essa oportunidade pode ser o próximo passo na sua carreira!

Sobre a Empresa Nossa empresa é guiada pelo propósito do nutricionista Matheus Galvão e pela missão de transformar vidas por meio da mudança de hábitos alimentares. Inspirados em valores como empatia, humanização, seriedade e compromisso com a transformação individual, buscamos democratizar o acesso a profissionais altamente capacitados e oferecer um atendimento humanizado e personalizado. Nossa visão é ser referência no Brasil em mudança de hábitos alimentares até 2030, refletindo nossa metodologia comprovada, integração de especialidades e constante inovação. Se você busca um ambiente colaborativo, transparente e comprometido com o desenvolvimento contínuo, aqui é o lugar certo para você crescer!

Responsabilidades e Atividades:

Elaboração e Personalização de Treinos: Criar planos de treino personalizados para os pacientes, considerando seus objetivos, níveis de condicionamento e necessidades específicas. Atualizar periodicamente os treinos com base no feedback dos pacientes e nos indicadores de desempenho.

Acompanhamento e Cobrança de Resultados: Monitorar diariamente o progresso dos pacientes e garantir a adesão ao plano prescrito. Realizar cobranças e interações motivacionais para engajar os pacientes e incentivar a evolução contínua.

Gestão e Análise de Indicadores de Desempenho: Coletar, registrar e analisar métricas como número de alunos ativos, novos treinos enviados, atualizações, ajustes realizados, cancelamentos, renovações e taxa de renovação. Comparar os resultados atuais com os dos últimos três meses para identificar tendências e oportunidades de melhoria.

Preparação e Apresentação de Relatórios: Elaborar relatórios escritos e apresentações em slides contendo os principais indicadores e insights. Apresentar os resultados em reuniões (entre 10 a 20 minutos) e sugerir estratégias de melhoria para o setor.

Colaboração e Comunicação Interna: Utilizar ferramentas de gestão (ClickUp, CRM e outras) para organizar e atualizar demandas e projetos diariamente. Participar ativamente de reuniões internas e da equipe de liderança, mantendo uma comunicação clara e proativa com todos os membros da equipe, inclusive com o CEO quando necessário.

Proatividade e Melhoria Contínua: Identificar desafios e propor melhorias nos processos de prescrição e acompanhamento dos treinos. Investir continuamente no próprio desenvolvimento profissional, acompanhando novas tendências e metodologias na área.

Processos de Comunicação e Fluxo de Trabalho: Diariamente: Comunicação de itens prioritários via WhatsApp e interações com a equipe pelo grupo corporativo. Atualização de todas as solicitações e responsabilidades no ClickUp. Semanalmente: Participação em reuniões 1:1 com a liderança (30 minutos) e envio de relatório de realizações e métricas até às 22:00 (Horário de Brasília) em dias úteis. Participação em reuniões diárias, semanais e mensais da equipe de liderança. Cadeia de Comunicação: Pesquisa em conteúdos e materiais disponíveis para resolução de situações; Consulta à equipe para insights e, se necessário, escalonamento ao CEO até a resolução completa do problema.

Requisitos e Qualificações:

Formação Acadêmica: É obrigatório ser graduado em Educação Física. É necessário possuir registro profissional. Experiência Profissional: Comprovação de experiência prévia na prescrição de treinos online e atendimento a alunos de forma digital, utilizando WhatsApp e videochamada. Não há tempo mínimo exigido, mas o candidato deve demonstrar que realiza suas atividades de forma organizada e eficaz. Conhecimentos Técnicos e Ferramentas: Domínio no uso do

MFIT Personal

, o aplicativo que utilizamos para prescrever treinos. Experiência com computador, incluindo o uso de

planilhas, Excel, CRM e ferramentas de gestão (como o ClickUp). Competências Comportamentais e Habilidades: Perfil motivador, comunicativo, organizado, proativo e analítico. Habilidade para engajar os pacientes e cobrar resultados, contribuindo para a evolução e o comprometimento deles com os treinos. Perfil extremamente organizado, analítico e com facilidade para executar tarefas repetitivas sem perder o foco. Excelente comunicação, com habilidade para escrever corretamente em português. Ser simpática(o) e extrovertida(o) é fundamental para motivar e engajar os pacientes, muitos dos quais chegam desmotivados e sem foco, buscando em nossa equipe o suporte necessário para uma mudança efetiva. Proatividade, paixão por trabalhar com pessoas e vontade de aprender continuamente. Certificações e Cursos Complementares: Certificações em cursos de prescrição de treinos e metodologias de treinamento são consideradas vantagens.

title: Cientista de Dados Sr/Lider

Manter-se atualizado sobre as últimas tendências em tecnologia e dados, buscando oportunidades para inovar e otimizar os processos. title: Senior Data Analyst
description:
Senior Data Analyst (Remote, US Central Time Zone Hours) We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Data Analyst to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will collaborate with the data products team to perform a variety of analytics-related tasks, including creating dashboards, building tables, and conducting in-depth data analyses. This position requires strong experience working in an Azure environment and the ability to work remotely while aligning with US Central Time Zone hours.

Key Responsibilities: Partner with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into data-driven solutions. Perform data analysis and data profiling, identifying new data sources to enhance business processes. Develop, refine, and maintain dashboards, reports, and analytics products to support decision-making. Conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT), including creating test plans based on stakeholder discussions and adapting existing tests for new use cases. Document processes, findings, and methodologies to ensure transparency and reusability.

Required Skills and Qualifications: Strong communication and interpersonal skills to effectively engage with stakeholders. Proven experience in data analysis, data profiling, and delivering analytics solutions. Experience working in an Azure environment. Familiarity with UAT processes, including test creation and execution. Attention to detail and ability to document workflows and findings.

If you thrive in a fast-paced environment and have a passion for transforming data into actionable insights, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Product Owner Sênior
description:
SIS Innov & Tech

title: Fullstack Senior (JAVA)

title: Desenvolvedor Angular
description:

ANTES

de sair desenvolvendo Escrever código claro e de qualidade para softwares e aplicativos, além de realizar revisões de testes Seu código precisa ser responsivo, não estamos nos anos 90 Ao produzir um frontend, o resultado não pode ser feio que dói Detectar e solucionar problemas de software Desenvolver, implementar e testar APIs Contribuir com sugestões para projetos de desenvolvimento de software Estar disponível para calls durante o período comercial

prazo

e

pronto Não ser uma pessoa que fica batendo a cabeça sem pedir ajuda Não informar atrasos e problemas na véspera. Avisa antes, assim que surge o impedimento

title: Key Accounts Sales Manager of Latin America
description:
Company :Sungrow Hydrogen Postion: Key Accounts Sales Manager Report line: report to SUNGROW Hydrogen Latin America Head of Marketing and Sales Location: Brasil or Chile , could travel as needed.

Company Induction: As the subsidiary of Sungrow (Stock Code: 300274), Sungrow Hydrogen Sci.&Tech. Co., Ltd. (hereinafter Sungrow Hydrogen) specializes in water electrolysis technology for hydrogen production. Its main products include ALK electrolyzer, PEM electrolyzer, PWM hydrogen production power supply, gas-liquid separation equipment, hydrogen purification equipment and intelligent hydrogen management system. Sungrow Hydrogen is committed to providing“efficient, intelligent, safe” flexible green hydrogen production system solutions. Sungrow Hydrogen adheres to market demand orientation, and takes technological innovation as the driving force for development. It has cultivated a professional R&D team with rich experience and strong independent innovation ability, applied for more than 480 patents and copyright certificates, participated in the drafting of a number of industrial standards, mastering core technologies of flexible green hydrogen production and offshore wind hydrogen production. The company has built a leading 20MW water electrolysis hydrogen production empirical base, a product research center, a key materials research center, a Hydrogen Research Institute in Germany, and the world's leading hydroge

Main responsibilities:

As a key member of sales organization to accomplish the revenue, margin and account receivable target set on annual basis. The candidate will need to manage key accounts and maintain long-term partnership. The candidate will work with all major utilities, owner, developer, EPC, O&M customers to drive the business. The candidate will perform in business development role for potential market segment or new market. The candidate will also need to perform the following: Help to develop product marketing strategy and establish a long-term strategic partnership with key account Have strong sales ability to close deal and achieve the sales target and KPI Periodically visit key customers，and have project order contacts with leading contractors (big scale) in Hydrogen related industry Help company to gain better brand recognition by assisting trade shows and other public functions; Collect market information, including emerging market data, industry trend, product standard and competitor’s information etc. The candidate will work closely with technical team to fulfill customers’ request and timely communicate with HQ; Other assigned tasks as required.

Qualifications:

Minimum 5 years’ sales experience and 2 years’ direct sales experience in the PV and Wind energy related business. Familary with renewable energy industry in Latin America /European and have a good understanding of business culture in this area. Having a wide network with key players in renewable energy industry is perferred. Having strong ability to build up the customer’s relationship quickly is perferred. Professional in dealing with international business. Good teamwork and strong team coordination ability. Public speaking skills is a plus Excellent communication skills and team player Self-starter and continuous learner Strong passion about hydrogen industry

title: Técnico de Campo II - Sul
description:
Descrição da vaga Quando você pensa em carreira, o que vem à sua mente? Propósito? Colaboração? Ser protagonista para fazer a diferença? No PagBank temos tudo isso e muito mais.

Estamos em busca de pessoas que vistam a camisa com orgulho. Gente com vontade de facilitar a vida financeira das pessoas e impulsionar negócios!

Tá a fim de uma carreira que rende mais?

Confira essa oportunidade e #VemProPags! Responsabilidades e atribuições

Atuar nas entregas, coletas, instalação e ativação de máquinas nos estabelecimentos dos clientes. Apoiar na ativação de chip, solução de problemas de conectividade da máquina, esclarecimentos ao cliente sobre uso da máquina ou cartões. Realizar prestação de contas dos cartões corporativos. Executar o atendimento de prioridades e rotinas de atendimento em campo.

Requisitos e qualificações

Ensino médio completo. Conhecimento em Excel. Possuir CNH A. Habilidade com atendimento e controles.

Informações adicionais Para se destacar nesta posição seria legal se você também tivesse:

Experiência prévia em funções administrativas ou de suporte técnico. Habilidades organizacionais e de gestão de tempo. Olá, somos o PagBank! Talvez você nos conheça por maquininhas ou comerciais que ficam na memória, mas somos muito mais!

Todos os dias desenvolvemos produtos e soluções inspiradas pelo nosso propósito: facilitar a vida financeira das pessoas e negócios.

Trabalhamos para transformar a forma como as pessoas lidam com dinheiro abrindo novas possibilidades para alcançarem seus sonhos.

Como fazemos tudo isso?

Com gente Somos um time que joga junto! Aqui valorizamos todas as diversidades, seja de raça/etnia, gênero, idade, origem, pessoa com deficiência, orientação afetivo-sexual, constituição familiar e estética.

Com tecnologia O espírito disruptivo e inovador está no nosso DNA: somos parte do Grupo UOL, empresa 100% brasileira, foi pioneira na internet e transforma a vida das pessoas desde 1996.

Com uma só cultura Temos uma cultura forte e única, capaz de nos levar além, para continuarmos crescendo e perpetuando o nosso negócio.

Somos um dos maiores bancos digitais do país e uma das fintechs mais rentáveis do segmento.

Para vivenciar tudo isso, você terá um pacote completo de benefícios que fazem toda a diferença: Vale-alimentação e/ou refeição. Plano de saúde e odontológico. Seguro de vida. Parceria com TotalPass e ZenKlub. Licença maternidade e paternidade estendidas. Auxílio-creche. Descontos de até 50% em pós-graduação e MBA de grandes instituições, como FIA, FAAP e PUCRS.

E tem mais: No dress code: o importante é você usar o que te faz bem. #TáDeParabéns: Day off no aniversário. Baby Gift: presente para recém-nascidos.

Tá a fim de uma carreira que rende mais?

Vem pro nosso time imbatível! #VemProPags.

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
description:
About Us: Bequest.com is a Silicon Valley backed legal-tech company. We build B2B software for trust and estate lawyers, accountants, and professional fiduciaries. We are on track to raise a Series A this year.

What We're Looking For: We are looking for a Full-Stack engineer who is extremely experienced in Typescript, ambitious and hardworking.

Bequest will continue to grow

rapidly

and we want our core members to grow with us. This is a startup, the asymmetric risk here should be attractive to you.

You will thrive at Bequest if you can own problems end-to-end, and are willing to pick up knowledge you're missing to get the job done. You will build and learn at a very fast pace with a small but mighty team. If you're ready to take on new challenges and make a real impact, we'd love to hear from you!

Compensation: Starting salary is 80k USD/year, starting equity is 0.25%.

Key Responsibilities: Frontend: Design and build complex web apps using React, design libraries (like Chakra UI) and state management tools (like Redux or Context) Backend: Use Typescript, Node and NestJS/Express to build a REST API Database: Design database schemas using Prisma and PostgresQL

Required Qualifications: Proficient in English Deep understanding of Typescript (We use it everywhere!) 3+ years designing and developing Frontend applications using React 3+ years developing Backend APIs using NodeJS (We use NestJS) Experience using SQL databases and designing schemas Familiarity with Docker Built production-grade apps with a high bar of quality Strong problem solving skills, high agency and resourceful

Nice to Have: Love Hackathons! Have been an engineer at early-stage company

title: Content Strategist
description:
Strategist, Creative Content Strategist, or B2B Strategist are alternative position titles.

Our client, a 100% remote digital agency representing US-based clients, is seeking to add experienced Content Strategists to their team in either a part-time or full-time capacity. They also allow new team members to start part-time, continue their existing role, and either remain part-time or move to full-time hours when available. A leadership path is also available for a full-time position: Director of Strategy.

We're seeking strategists with profound expertise in

Marketing and B2B marketing communications and a solid background in thought leadership and content strategy.

This role demands a professional who can: Lead the creation and execution of our agency's content and social media strategy, primarily focusing on

(80%) and supplementary engagement across Twitter/X, Instagram, and client websites (20%). This includes driving organic content for brand and leadership accounts, stimulating relevant conversations, and fostering engagement to boost customer growth. Brief copywriters and designers to ensure all projects are executed to a high creative standard. You'll manage the social media calendar, crafting and scheduling -specific content while developing a diverse inventory of text, image, and video content. Provide timely and strategic feedback across various tasks, including website optimization, social content direction, industry trends, and campaign planning. You'll be instrumental in writing creative briefs for our teams, drawing from client briefs to spark innovative ideas. Host brainstorming sessions, leveraging consumer insights, research, and strategic frameworks to inform content development and simplify complex concepts for our audience. Continuously research emerging brands, creative campaigns, and cultural moments, translating these insights into unique and compelling content ideas for . Your role is pivotal in shaping our brand communications strategies, ensuring our content resonates with current and potential customers by exploring the business context and establishing clear objectives for each campaign. Be available and flexible to occasionally lead calls with the clients to explain the strategic thinking behind the work. Ability to copywrite directly for a client when something is needed on short notice. Must have experience working in a mid to large-sized marketing agency, such as Ogilvy, McCann, or others. (mandatory) Strong collaboration skills to ensure that the work gets done by copywriters and designers. Great experience is needed, giving feedback to different departments and being able to jump in to finish things at the last minute if required.

Since this role will require regular interaction with US-based clients and 100% English content, please only apply if you have a near native-level written and spoken English and or have studied extensively in an entirely English-speaking environment. This opportunity would suit US expatriates since you would have the flexibility to spend prolonged periods stateside and anywhere else you may choose!

title: CONSULTOR INTERNO DHO
description:
Responsabilidades:

Dar suporte no desenvolvimento de estratégias das áreas, revisando processos, dimensionamento de profissionais e tratativa dos indicadores relacionados à Gestão de Pessoas; Realizar e acompanhar o desenvolvimento das lideranças por meio do PDI (Plano de Desenvolvimento Individual e PDL (Programa de Desenvolvimento de Liderança); Realizar o levantamento das necessidades de treinamentos e promover treinamentos, encontros ou eventos relacionados a gestão de desenvolvimento; Garantir a execução do programa de gestão por competência, cumprindo prazos, acompanhando cronograma e execução das etapas relacionadas; Conduzir pesquisa de clima bienal, estruturando questionário, cronograma e aplicação. Tabular resultado, propor plano de ação e acompanhar evolução das melhorias aprovadas pela Administração; Acompanhar a evolução e conceitos da avaliação de desempenho, e quando necessário elaborar com a liderança estratégias para o desenvolvimento do colaborador; Realizar ouvidoria de colaboradores, analisar e encaminhar as manifestações por meio de relatório ao setor responsável, e acompanhar a tratativa para feedback; Investigar dúvidas oriundas de ouvidoria e Compliance, elaborando dossiês e relatórios; Realizar processo seletivo externo e interno, considerando as competências e conhecimentos, em parceria com o líder da área; Realizar análise do perfil comportamental a fim de conduzir R&S e apoio no desenvolvimento de líderes; Fazer análise do desligamento, acompanhar a liderança no momento da demissão, realizar a entrevista de desligamento com o colaborador e direcionar os fatos para o responsável da área, acompanhando plano de melhoria, quando houver; Realizar integração e mini integração de acordo com o conteúdo e cronograma preestabelecido; Manter atualizado os materiais, manuais, políticas e procedimentos relacionados ao setor de atuação.

description:

Queremos ser a maior e mais amada rede de logística digital, quer fazer parte disso? Somos uma startup que atua no segmento do varejo e logística, apoiando os pequenos e médios empreendedores a se tornarem mais competitivos no mercado e a alavancarem suas vendas. Por isso, buscamos um Super

title: Principal AWS Cloud Security - Compliance - DevSecOps (REMOTE)
description:
ITTConnect is seeking a Principal

AWS Cloud Security & Compliance Engineer (DevSecOps)

to work remotely for a client in the US. This is a potentially long term position with a client that is a global leader in consulting, digital transformation, technology and engineering services with over 300,000 team members in nearly 50 countries. The end client is in the telecom space.

Job location: Remote, work from home, anywhere in Brazil

.

Only resumes in English will be reviewed.

MUST BE fluent in English.

All interviews will be in English only .

We are seeking an experienced

AWS Cloud Security and Compliance Engineer

with

extensive hands-on experience in securing cloud environments at scale

. This role is ideal for a

seasoned security expert

who thrives on designing, implementing, and managing cloud security controls, ensuring compliance with industry standards, and mitigating security risks across AWS infrastructure. The ideal candidate will bring a deep understanding of AWS security services, regulatory compliance frameworks, and cloud-native security best practices.

Key Responsibilities: Security Architecture & Design : Lead the design and implementation of secure AWS architectures, ensuring compliance with security frameworks and industry best practices. Governance & Compliance : Develop, enforce, and monitor compliance with SOC 2, ISO 27001, NIST, CIS, FedRAMP, PCI-DSS, HIPAA, and other security standards. Cloud Security Operations : Implement and manage AWS security services such as AWS IAM, AWS KMS, AWS GuardDuty, AWS Security Hub, AWS Macie, AWS Config, AWS WAF, and AWS Shield. Threat Detection & Incident Response : Develop SIEM integrations, monitor security logs, investigate incidents, and lead incident response efforts to mitigate threats. Automation & Infrastructure Security : Implement Infrastructure as Code (IaC) security policies using Terraform, AWS CloudFormation, or AWS CDK. Automate security monitoring and compliance reporting. Identity & Access Management (IAM) : Define and enforce least privilege access controls, manage AWS Organizations and Service Control Policies (SCPs). DevSecOps & CI/CD Security : Embed security into the CI/CD pipeline, ensuring secure deployment practices across cloud workloads. Security Risk Assessments : Perform cloud security risk assessments, threat modeling, and penetration testing to identify and mitigate vulnerabilities. Security Awareness & Training : Mentor engineering teams on secure coding, cloud security best practices, and AWS security controls. Stakeholder Collaboration : Work with engineering, compliance, and business teams to align security strategies with organizational goals.

Required Qualifications: 10+ years of hands-on experience in cybersecurity, cloud security, and compliance, with at least 5 years in AWS security. Expert-level knowledge of AWS security services, architecture, and best practices. Deep understanding of compliance frameworks (e.g., SOC 2, ISO 27001, NIST, FedRAMP, PCI-DSS, HIPAA). Experience with AWS IAM, VPC security, AWS WAF, KMS, CloudTrail, Config, Security Hub, Macie, and GuardDuty. Proficiency in SIEM solutions, security automation, and cloud-native security tools. Hands-on experience with IaC security (Terraform, CloudFormation), container security (EKS, ECS), and serverless security. Strong background in DevSecOps, securing CI/CD pipelines, and integrating security into cloud-native development. Expertise in identity & access management (IAM), RBAC, MFA, and Zero Trust security models. Experience with incident response, threat detection, and forensic analysis in AWS. Proficient in scripting and automation (Python, Bash, or PowerShell). Strong communication skills with the ability to influence technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Preferred Qualifications: AWS Certified Security – Specialty or AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional certification. Experience in multi-cloud security (AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus. Familiarity with security risk management frameworks (e.g., MITRE ATT&CK, OWASP, CIS Benchmarks). Knowledge of AI/ML security, API security, and data protection strategies. Telecommunications industry experience.

title: Analista Contábil Júnior
description:
Nossa missão

Somos o Gringo, uma startup com a missão de descomplicar a vida dos motoristas e que está mudando a forma como eles se relacionam com seus veículos. Estamos crescendo e precisamos de mais um(a) Analista Contábil Júnior a bordo para acelerar com a gente

O que valorizamos

⭐

Simplicidade: Busque sempre por soluções simples! Faça Acontecer: Não há blocker que vá te impedir de completar sua tarefa - Espírito Empreendedor! Juntos: Acreditamos que as melhores soluções surgem através do trabalho colaborativo, seja com outras pessoas do Gringo ou com qualquer stakeholder do nosso ecossistema.

Responsabilidades e atribuições

Como Analista Contábil Júnior do Gringo, você vai:

Dar suporte aos analistas seniores na elaboração das explicações referentes às variações mensais das contas patrimoniais e de resultado sob sua responsabilidade, executando revisão analítica dos Balanços Patrimoniais e das Demonstrações de Resultados, com o objetivo de ratificar que as movimentações tenham ocorrido apropriadamente; Executar as atividades de rotina da contabilidade sob sua responsabilidade, por meio de relatórios e informações suportes assegurando o cumprimento dos prazos estabelecidos no cronograma de fechamento contábil; Apoiar na preparação da consolidação mensal dos resultados, inclusive efetuando cálculos e lançamentos aplicáveis, garantindo o prazo e qualidade do processo; Atualizar mensalmente as demonstrações financeiras; Atender a auditoria externa fornecendo relatórios, informações, documentos e conciliações que atendam às exigências dos auditores auxiliando na condução dos trabalhos nos prazos estabelecidos.

Requisitos e qualificações

Sounds like you?

Requisitos

Formação, completa ou cursando, em Ciências Contábeis (obrigatório); Experiência Profissional: Conhecimento básico na aplicação dos CPCs (desejável); Habilidades Técnicas: Conhecimentos em SAP Business One (desejável) e Excel intermediário (desejável).

Você vai ser dar bem na Gringo se:

Tiver Atitude de "dono", ser animado para arregaçar as mangas e não ter medo de sujar as mãos; Aprender rápido e conseguir desempenhar bem em um ambiente ágil, dinâmico e orientado a resultados; Adaptar-se facilmente a mudanças e feedbacks; For genuinamente curios@ e mergulhar nos problemas; Não se contentar com respostas superficiais e sempre for atrás da verdade; For receptivo a conflitos de ideias e gostar de questionar o status quo; For ambicios@ e gostar de um ambiente onde você é constantemente desafiado a se superar.

Informações adicionais

Benefícios

✨

Assistência médica e odontológica (sem desconto para você e dependentes) Futuros Gringxs: auxílio educação para filhos até 21 anos WOBA: espaços reservados em co-workings de todo o Brasil para quem quiser trabalhar presencialmente algumas vezes no mês Licença maternidade e paternidade estendidas Licença PETernidade (day-off quando você adotar um animalzinho) Seguro de vida Vale Refeição e Alimentação (cartão Flexível) Auxílio Home Office Day-off de aniversário Gympass

Local de trabalho Somos 100% remotos e nosso time Gringo está espalhado por todo o Brasil!

title: Senior Product Owner
description:
Ready to lead Lebi into the future? We're looking for a Lead Product Owner to take the reins of Lebi, our free sports prediction platform, where users can make predictions on games and win big:

The product has just launched, and now it’s your time to steer its evolution and turbocharge its growth! Your mission: constantly improve the platform, make it even more fun and engaging for users, and ensure it’s the ultimate place for sports fans to predict, play, and win.

You'll be the captain of the product lifecycle, from shaping the vision to getting your hands dirty with the details. Your expertise in product strategy and user experience will ensure that Lebi keeps growing and adapting to meet the needs of our enthusiastic user base. Collaboration is key, so you’ll work closely with various teams and have the chance to interact with the C-suite—talk about an exciting ride!

To be more specific, you will:

Craft product strategy and vision : develop an exciting and bold product vision for Lebi, ensuring it not only aligns with our strategy but also gives users exactly what they crave. Take ownership of the product roadmap : lead the charge on the product roadmap, making sure it’s spot on with budget, timelines, and resources—while being flexible enough to pivot based on user feedback and evolving needs. Make data-driven decisions : use data, insights, and testing to fuel your product decisions, making sure the user experience is always getting better and better. Facilitate cross-functional collaboration : work hand-in-hand with teams across development, design, and community to drive Lebi’s evolution, aligning on priorities and coordinating efforts to make the magic happen. Promote community engagement : get in the mix with users, stakeholders, and advocates to hear their ideas, pain points, and suggestions, keeping the dialogue flowing and ensuring Lebi evolves in a way that excites everyone.

The ideal profile

We’re looking for someone who shares our vision and wants to grow alongside Lebi. You’re a team player who thrives in fast-paced, evolving environments. You embody core values of transparency, agility, and dedication. You’re the perfect fit for this role if:

Passion for sports : you are deeply passionate about sports, understand sports culture, and have a strong interest in sports predictions, which is essential to driving user engagement and enhancing the platform's experience. Gamified product experience:

you have experience in developing or managing gamified products, and you understand how to design engaging, fun, and rewarding user experiences. Entrepreneurial mindset : you’re passionate about driving innovation and continuously improving Lebi to delight our users. Comfortable in fast-paced environments : you can quickly make decisions even when there’s limited process or infrastructure. Deep empathy for users : you understand our users and their needs, creating solutions that enhance their experience. Sharp problem-solving and analytical skills : you use both data and intuition to guide decision-making, with a focus on achieving user-centric outcomes. Exceptional communication skills : you can keep internal teams aligned and maximize external partnerships through clear and effective communication. Experience in product-led companies : you have a background in product management or a related role, with experience in building and growing digital platforms. Industry knowledge : you have at least one year of experience or a major project in the fields of sports (betting is a plus) and familiarity with gamified applications. Leadership experience : you’ve demonstrated leadership in a product management role, with at least a year of experience in leading cross-functional teams. Product exploration and go-to-market expertise : you’re skilled in product design, planning, and execution, with experience bringing products from launch to scale. Startup experience (preferred) : you thrive in high-growth startup environments where adaptability and fast-paced execution are key.

Feeling up to the task of managing the main challenges of the role, even without meeting all criteria? We’re eager to hear from you! We believe great candidates come in all shapes and sizes, and you don’t need to meet every requirement to be a great fit.

Desirable Technical Knowledge:

Scrum : familiarity with agile processes to manage product development. Project management : ability to prioritize and manage goals effectively. Development : basic understanding of PHP, JavaScript, and SQL. AI : understanding of how artificial intelligence can enhance product development.

Next steps in the process ✅

1st Interview with your future manager to make sure you meet the role’s requirements 2nd interview with HR to better understand who you are and make sure there is a cultural fit with MoveUp Media Last step: a proposition for us to start working together!

What’s in it for you

A full time remote work environment. A flexible schedule and paid time off. We measure results , not hours. Attractive salary, depending on your level of seniority in the role and your location. Development opportunities. As a startup with rapid growth, there are a lot of possibilities that can arise and we are committed to accompany our team members in their career path. Yearly Workation — a mix of work and vacation . Once a year, we find a cool place to work and have fun together. 1.000€ / year dedicated to your professional development, wellness, sports or cultural events of your choice.

MoveUp Media

We're a dynamic and driven team that's all about growth. Partnering with top-notch brands in the exciting worlds of iGaming and sports, we're on a mission to connect sports fans to global advertisers. SEO is our bread and butter, and we're relentless in our pursuit of getting our websites to the top of search results for all the best—and sometimes toughest—keywords.

With bases in both France and Brazil, we're making waves across 20+ markets. And here's the best part: we're a 100% remote team that thrives on efficiency and flexibility. So if you're ready to join a company that's all about results and values your work-life balance, we'd love to hear from you!

Our approach

We focus on people. We put end users' experience as a priority on all strategies and processes. Thus, we aim to make complex topics easy to understand and provide exactly what our audience is seeking. We achieve this by carefully analyzing data and reflecting upon it, writing the content with care, and ensuring a smooth user experience.

Here at MoveUp Media, we believe in the power of diversity and inclusion. We are committed to providing equal opportunities for all individuals, regardless of their background, race, gender, sexual orientation, or abilities. We celebrate the unique perspectives and talents that each person brings to the table, and we strive to create a welcoming and supportive environment where everyone can thrive and succeed. We firmly believe that a diverse workforce leads to greater teamwork and success. Join us in our journey towards a more inclusive and equitable future! Note: If you have any more questions or need further assistance for specific arrangements linked to your recruitment process, feel free to contact

title: Developer ServiceNow (ITOM)
description:
Professional with more than 3 years of experience; Focus on ITOM module solutions, implementing tool functionalities to support customer processes; Define and implement external system integrations with the ServiceNow platform; Experience in developing pattern extensions for Discovery and Service Mapping for infrastructure and network elements; Experience in error analysis and Discovery and Service Mapping logs; Experience in setting CMDB and Data Manager health indicators; Experience in implementation of network device discovery; Knowledge in solution and middleware architecture, such as WebLogic, Tomcat, Apache, Websphere, Jboss and other technologies; Experience in setting up MID Servers for Discovery and Service Mapping. Desirable knowledge in configuration of connectors and rules for Event Management; Experience in error analysis in event management; Desirable knowledge in asset lifecycle solution and management; Ability to interact with platform experts and process managers to define best practices for the use of ServiceNow platform functionalities; Desirable ServiceNow CIS Certification - Discovery, Service Mapping and/or Event Management; Desirable ITIL Certification.

Our #wiproites have: • Food Voucher • Childcare assistanc • 100% Life Insuranc • Annual bonus (PLR • Two training platforms: WiLearn with 10,000 trainin • Discounts for purchases and courses in a partner networ • #IPreferToRefer(Wiplinks) - every contributor earns a bonus for referring a person who also becomes a #Wiproit • Recognition program for time in the company: commemoration with certificate + points in the “Winner Circle” progra • Yoga, Pilates and Meditation classe • Online Nutritionist Program: encouraging good eating habits and defining a nutritional pla • Lectures and workshops: encouraging health and well-being, Career Workshops, Leadership Development Plan.

A Wipro é uma empresa igualitária que oferece oportunidades de emprego para todas as pessoas, executando um processo seletivo que não considera raça, sexo, nacionalidade, ascendência, deficiência, orientação sexual ou qualquer outro status protegido pela lei aplicável.

title: Agente de Negócios - Anota Garçom PJ Rio Grande RS
description:
Nosso Modo de Fazer no Time Estamos em busca de um(a)

Agente de Negócios

focado(a) no

Anota Garçom

title: Quality Assurance Analyst
description:
Company Description Metrobi is a delivery fulfillment platform designed specifically to support local businesses. We help these businesses manage their deliveries efficiently by connecting them with skilled drivers tailored to meet their delivery needs. Additionally, we provide essential tools for logistical, financial, and marketing support, empowering local food and beverage makers to expand their businesses

Role of the QA Team: Our QA team is crucial in ensuring the quality of our platform. There are two main tasks you will focus on: Bug Analysis:

Understand and diagnose bugs that make it into production. This requires a solid understanding of our product and excellent problem-solving skills. Feature Verification:

Manually check whether new features work as intended. This involves strong analytical skills to assess user experience and interface design.

While specific technical skills like SQL, Git, reading Python code, and creating automated tests are beneficial, they are not required.

﻿We're looking for candidates with strong English, product analysis skills, and excellent communication. This is a full-time position offering $600+/month.

title: AI Software Development Engineer in Test
description:
Project Description: Open Video project is focused on OTT platform development for one of the largest North American TV providers. We are seeking a highly skilled AI Engineer to join our Software Quality Engineering (SQE) team. The ideal candidate will have a dual focus: contributing to AI/ML solution development while performing responsibilities typical of a Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET). This role involves building and deploying AI-powered solutions for enhancing software testing, automation frameworks, and processes.

Responsibilities: AI Engineering: 1. AI Solution Development: 1.1. Develop AI-powered solutions to improve software quality assurance processes. 1.2. Leverage frameworks like Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and other state-of-the-art AI/ML frameworks to design innovative testing and debugging tools. 1.3. Create models for triaging and debugging test case failures using structured and unstructured data, such as log files. 2. Framework Optimization: 2.1. Enhance testing processes with AI to automate root-cause analysis, bug detection, and recommendation systems. 2.2. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into existing software testing pipelines. 3. MLOps Development: 3.1. Design, implement, and maintain robust MLOps pipelines for continuous integration and deployment of AI/ML models. 3.2. Automate workflows for model training, evaluation, and deployment.

SDET Responsibilities: 1. Test Case Creation & Maintenance: 1.1. Write, maintain, and optimize manual and automated test cases for functional, regression, and performance testing. 1.2. Collaborate with development teams to define test strategies and acceptance criteria for new features. 2. Automation Framework Development: 2.1. Build and enhance automation frameworks for Android, Web, and backend systems using tools like Appium, Selenium, or equivalent. 2.2. Integrate automation pre-checks, post-checks, and reporting systems to ensure test case reliability. 3. Code Review & Collaboration: 3.1. Review and provide feedback on code quality and design for testability. 3.2. Work closely with software engineers and other SDETs to drive testing best practices. 4. Test Data Management: 4.1. Work with engineering teams to ensure proper test data management, including synthetic data generation for testing AI-based solutions.

Mandatory Skills Description: AI/ML Expertise: - Strong knowledge of machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn). - Experience with MLOps tools (e.g., MLflow, Kubeflow, AWS Bedrock, SageMaker). - Proficiency in RAG frameworks and understanding of knowledge-based systems. - Familiarity with LangChain and Hugging Face Transformers. Experience working with Streamlit. - Strong command on all AWS services and prompt engineering techniques and Dspy. SDET Expertise: - Proficiency in test automation tools (e.g., Appium, Selenium, JUnit, TestNG). - Strong programming skills in languages like Python, Java. - Experience with CI/CD tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, or equivalent. General Skills: - Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure). - Knowledge of SQL and database management for test data validation. - Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills in software systems.

Languages: English: B2 Upper Intermediate

Keep updated and follow us at

for more information on our projects.

Position : Energy Specialist Location : Inside and outside EU-27 Assignment duration : 48 months Project budge t: 20M EUR

Qualifications and skills: At least 10 years professional experience in the field of: energy supply, renewable energy, energy infrastructure, energy efficiency, energy innovation, etc. Experience working with EU, EIB, WB etc. financed projects. A Master’s Degree or Bachelor's Degree relevant to the topic

Specific professional experience within at least one of the following sectors: Energy Supply: · Power generation and cogeneration: low-carbon power and CHP plants, carbon capture use and storage, renewable energy (hydro, wind energy, ocean, solar, geothermal, biomass, biogas, and waste to energy). · Heat production from renewable sources; · Efficient gas-fired small boilers applicable for buildings or SMEs; · Production and storage of gaseous, liquid and solid energy carriers from low-carbon energy sources; · Supply and processing of Critical Raw Material needed for key low-carbon technologies and/or energy transition in the EU.

Enabling Infrastructure: · Electricity transmission and distribution infrastructure, including storage. · Gas infrastructure: 1. connection to new sources of low carbon gases, 2. gas network projects that are planned to transport low carbon gases, including the rehabilitation and adaptation of existing gas infrastructures when it is part of this goal, 3. smart meters intended to reduce gas consumption. · District heating and cooling infrastructure, including storage. · Smart energy grids and smart meters

Energy Efficiency: · Energy efficiency in buildings (residential and non-residential sectors); · Energy efficiency in public lighting. · Energy efficiency and low-carbon technologies and processes in industrial facilities and SMEs;

Energy intensive industries and corresponding processes: · Carbon emission reduction technologies for iron and steel, refining, chemicals, cement, glass, paper refining and other industries

I nnovation: energy intensive industries and new types of energy infrastructure: · Corporate or national RDI programmes; · Commercial demonstration of innovative technologies, including demonstration projects, innovative manufacturing processes, and innovative low-carbon technologies in energy-intensive industries; · Technologies and business models that contribute to the implementation of the EU Strategic Energy Technology plan or decarbonisation of EII, including renewables, carbon capture use and storage, cross sectoral projects, sector coupling, circular economy pathways, electrification, biomass as feedstock, innovative energy carriers, nuclear fission and fusion; · New types of energy infrastructure including batteries and innovative energy storage technologies, demand response, market participants engaged in aggregation, electrification of transport, heating, digitalisation projects in energy sector; all projects that contribute towards sector coupling and increased flexibility of energy systems.

Language skills: · Excellent command of English (CEFR C1) (Minimum requirement)

If you are interested in this position, please apply and upload your CV. Please also make sure that you include one or more telephone numbers.

The work location is Remote.

Please note that only selected candidates will be contacted.

title: Tech Lead Specialist - Cartões (Vaga Afirmativa para Pessoas Pretas e Pardas)
description:
Venha fazer parte do time Bankly!

Somos uma plataforma de tecnologia financeira e Banking as a Service (BaaS) que tem o objetivo de alavancar tecnologia e quebrar barreiras para empoderar pessoas e empresas na transformação do ecossistema financeiro.

Espere encontrar aqui muitos desafios a serem enfrentados com trabalho em equipe!

#VemSerBankly

Missão:

Desenvolver e gerenciar soluções inovadoras de cartões que atendam às necessidades dos clientes, proporcionando segurança, conveniência e benefícios exclusivos.

A área de cartões é responsável pelo desenvolvimento, gestão e promoção de produtos de cartões, como cartões de crédito, débito, pré-pagos e corporativos. Essa área trabalha para oferecer soluções financeiras que atendam às necessidades dos clientes, proporcionando segurança, conveniência e benefícios exclusivos.

Dá uma olhada nos desafios que te esperam como Tech Lead Specialist aqui na Bankly: Liderança Técnica: Orientar a equipe em decisões técnicas, garantindo que as melhores práticas sejam seguidas e que o código seja de alta qualidade; Arquitetura de Software: Projetar e revisar a arquitetura do sistema, assegurando que ela seja escalável, eficiente e sustentável; Mentoria e Desenvolvimento de Equipe: Ajudar no crescimento profissional dos membros da equipe, oferecendo mentoria, feedback e suporte contínuo; Planejamento e Gestão de Projetos: Colaborar com gerentes de projeto para definir cronogramas, estimativas de esforço e alocação de recursos; Revisão de Código: Realizar revisões de código para garantir a qualidade e a conformidade com os padrões estabelecidos; Resolução de Problemas: Identificar e resolver problemas técnicos complexos que possam surgir durante o desenvolvimento; Comunicação: Facilitar a comunicação entre a equipe técnica e outras partes interessadas, como gerentes de produto e clientes; Inovação e Melhoria Contínua: Buscar constantemente novas tecnologias e metodologias que possam melhorar os processos e produtos da equipe.

Requisitos e qualificações: Desenvolvimento .Net/c#; Banco de Dados DynamoDb e SQL; Eventos Kafka e RabbitMQ; Cloud; SOLID / Clean Code; Design Patterns; API Restful; Testes unitários; Terraform.

Desejável: Experiencia com produto cartão de crédito e debito.

title: Field Support Analyst
description:

• Be responsible to image/reimage Equinor computers.
• Act as hands & eyes for Equinor and global IT teams on LOCATION.

• Be responsible to dispose broken/old/out of warranty IT items following company procedures.

title: Quality Assurance Automation Engineer
description:
Open Video project is focused on OTT platform development for one of the largest North American TV providers. We are looking for QA Automation Engineer to assess software quality through automated testing. You will be responsible for finding and reporting bugs and glitches. In this role, you should have a keen eye for detail and excellent communication skills.

Responsibilities: • Review and analyze system specifications • Execute test cases and analyze results • Create logs to document testing phases and defects • Report bugs and errors to development teams • Help troubleshoot issues • Conduct post-release/ post-implementation testing • Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle • Selection or identification of test cases for automation. • Creating an automation test plan. • Automation framework design and implementation according to the project structure. • Creating, Enhancing, Debugging, and Running Test Cases. • Organizing, monitoring defect management process Handling changes and conducting regression tests. • Find solutions for issues related to object identity issues and error handling. • Interaction with the people of the client-side to solve problems and update the situation. • Conduct performance testing to verify system scalability, efficiency, and reliability. • Create a test summary report for management review. • Analyze the underlying causes of performance issues and provide corrective action. • Suggest new tools and techniques to improve test efficiency. • Help in project planning, scheduling, budget, and tracking activities. • Assist in project design, development, and deployment activities. • Develop automated test scenarios and environments for performance testing. • Review and recommend improvements in existing test procedures.

Mandatory Skills Description: • Good written/verbal communication skills. • Experience in writing test cases • Good problem-solving, and analytical abilities • Good planning, organizational, and follow-up skills. • Experience in testing Android platforms • Familiar with Git, JIRA, Bitbucket, Jenkins. • Experience with Agile Development. • Development experience with Java, Appium, Selenium, Webdriver.io. • Knowledge and use of Android Studio, Charles Proxy, ADB logcat

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: • Experience with AndroidTV is a plus

Languages: English: B2 Upper Intermediate

title: Sales Development Representative
description:
We're hiring remote sales professionals in Latin America for our US Clients. Our clients are various lead generation agencies and remote inside sales teams based in the US.

This is a full-time remote, English-speaking role for a Sales Development Representative. The SDR will engage in outbound prospecting for potential clients in the US. The primary goal is to schedule introductory meetings for the Account Executives (AEs).

We're looking for salespeople that want to... work for a US company work remotely earn in US dollars

The pay range is between $1,750 - $2,500 per month + Commission

About the role

This is a full-time remote role for a Sales Development Representative. The SDR will engage with potential clients, generate leads, conduct sales activities, and contribute to business development efforts. The role will involve daily tasks such as prospecting, qualifying leads, making outbound calls and emails, using , and building relationships with key decision-makers.

Daily Tasks Research accounts and identify key players using tools like , ZoomInfo, Apollo, etc.. Create sequences using outreach tools like Reply, SalesLoft, etc.. Write cold messaging Cold Calls & follow-ups Schedule intro calls for AEs Enter data into the CRM Work with the team to create plans for accounts & campaigns

Qualifications 3+ years of work experience in B2B Sales Fluent in English (full professional proficiency) Experience in outbound prospecting via cold email, cold calling, & Excellent communication skills Ability to work independently and remotely Candidates must be based in Latin America

Additional skills we'd like to see (not required) Experience with sales automation tools (Outreach, SalesLoft, etc...) Experience with lead databases (, ZoomInfo, Apollo, etc...) Experience with CRMs (Salesforce, Hubspot, Pipedrive, etc...)

The type of person we're looking for: Solution-oriented - actively looks for solutions to solve a problem Organized - manages their daily and weekly tasks efficiently Well-spoken - Since this is a sales job, being able to communicate well is a must Disciplined - Takes responsibility for finding ways to meet the quota, even if it's hard Driven - Continuous desire to learn and improve Professional - presents themselves well during meetings

Ultimately, we want people who take responsibility for their quota and their own personal development.

What we offer: Pay

- Base Salary ranges between $1,750 - $2,500 per month + Commission Structure USD

- Maximize income by earning in US dollars Remote

- Enjoy the freedom of working from home while being part of a dynamic US-based team Training

- We provide all the tools and training you need to excel in your role and grow your skills. US Economy

- an opportunity to work with great companies and teams that sell into the US market.

Next Steps After you submit your application, we'll ask you to share your resume (must be in English), some highlights from your career, and a 1-minute video of yourself. If you're a fit, we'll schedule a Zoom interview. After the Zoom interview, we'll find a Client(s) for you to interview with. If a Client wants to hire you, then we'll hire you!

title: Chief Scientist (Polyurethane Foam）
description:
Midea is a leading Global Fortune 500 high technology company. Committed to bring innovation to life, Midea Group aims to develop solutions for our international customers that not only meet the requirements of the present, but also the challenges of tomorrow and the day after tomorrow. Midea develops, produces, and sells innovative products in five competence areas: Smart Home, Industrial Technologies, Building Technologies, Robotics & Automation, and Digital Innovation. We operate in more than 195 countries with over 150,000 employees. Midea embraces talents of characters of aiming high, customer first, transformation and innovation, inclusion and partnership to join the mission together to integrate with the world, and to inspire your future! To lead this effort, Midea has created this new position of Chief Scientist (Thermal Management & Refrigeration Technology. This position is preferred to be located in China.

Essential Job Duties: Lead the planning and development of insulation and thermal management technology platforms, working closely with R&D engineers specializing in foam materials, vacuum insulation materials, and system design to establish next-generation thermal insulation roadmaps and implementation plans. Drive cutting-edge research in insulation and thermal management technologies, with a strong focus on polyurethane foam insulation materials. Oversee the formulation development of polyurethane functional materials and pilot testing of new formulations to facilitate technology transfer from R&D to product applications. Improve and optimize polyurethane foam production processes to enhance product quality and manufacturing efficiency, collaborating with the R&D team to solve technical challenges in production. Promote technical collaboration with universities, research institutes, and leading upstream enterprises in the field of insulation and thermal management materials. Stay up to date with the latest advancements in insulation and thermal technologies, providing technical guidance and training to R&D engineers to enhance overall team expertise.

Qualifications: Ph.D. in Polymer Materials Processing, Polymer Chemistry & Physics, Materials Science, Chemical Engineering, or Mechanical Engineering, with 10+ years of experience in relevant fields. Strong foundation in material formulation and applied research, with expertise in polyurethane foam processing and optimization. Familiarity with mold design and the ability to enhance material flowability and overall performance through process improvements. 5+ years of experience in polyurethane foam material R&D, with a deep understanding of insulation materials for refrigerators. Extensive knowledge of polyurethane foam production processes and equipment, with a proven ability to independently resolve technical challenges. Strong innovation skills and a collaborative team mindset. Excellent communication, problem-solving, and project management abilities.

This role could be based in China, with the possibility of a hybrid arrangement. Candidates should be open to either relocating to China or spending approximately half of their time working there while partially working remotely.

title: Desenvolvedor (a) BackEnd Java/Node Pleno
description:
Buscamos um (a) desenvolvedor (a) de software pleno, para fazer parte da Tribo Serviços de Logística.

Este profissional atuará em projetos responsáveis por gerar ferramentas para que os parceiros do Magalu, que vendem dentro do nosso Marketplace, possam gerir e operar sua logística. Esta atuação se dá desde apoiar as definições de arquitetura, até o desenvolvimento e acompanhamento das entregas de funcionalidades dos projetos.

Esperamos que o profissional seja capaz de:

Criar aplicações do zero, considerando arquitetura, dependências e testes, seguindo boas práticas de desenvolvimento. Priorizar qualidade de software e manutenibilidade. Refatorar e dar manutenção em projetos maduros. Identificar e priorizar dívidas técnicas, visando redução de custos e melhoria de performance. Testar e validar entregas em ambiente de homologação. Auxiliar na documentação dos produtos. Suportar o Product Manager, alinhando desenvolvimento e negócios. Contribuir nas cerimônias ágeis, como Kanban e Scrum. Compartilhar conhecimento com a equipe.

Esperamos que este profissional, tenha experiência como pleno com:

Desenho e aplicação de arquitetura de software; Lógica de programação; Padrões de projeto - Design Patterns; Desenvolvimento de API (RESTful); Sistemas distribuídos com baixa latência, resiliência e escalabilidade; Monitoramento de aplicações; Validação de qualidade de código - Code Quality; Estruturas de dados (banco relacional, não relacional); Mensagerias (RabbitMQ, Kafka); Documentação para gestão de mudanças - GMUD; Integração e entrega contínua - CI/CD ; Ferramentas DevOps (GitLab, Docker, Kubernetes, Grafana, etc); Testes de software (TDD, BDD, etc); Linguagens de programação: Java e Typescript (Node); Implementação de front end e micro front end utilizando React, HTML e CSS.

Benefícios que oferecemos:

VR/VA, Vale Transporte, Assistência Médica e Odontológica e Auxílio Creche. Gympass para bem-estar e saúde. Bolsa de estudo com até 50% de desconto. Descontos especiais nas empresas do Grupo Magalu (Magalu, Netshoes, Época Cosméticos, Estante Virtual, Kabum entre outras). Auxílio Creche

Modelo de Trabalho

Adotamos o modelo 100% remoto, proporcionando flexibilidade, enquanto mantém a interação virtual com a equipe para garantir uma colaboração eficaz e um ambiente de crescimento contínuo. ‘’Se você busca um ambiente de crescimento e desafios,

Vem ser feliz’’! Nossos valores nos unem e nossas diferenças nos potencializam como um grupo. Mais do que igualdade, buscamos equidade: Aqui, temos espaço para sermos autênticos, independentemente de gênero, etnia, raça, orientação sexual, clero ou deficiência.

Como é o ambiente de trabalho? No Luizalabs, temos grande autonomia e responsabilidade, somos multidisciplinares, auto gerenciáveis e com pouca burocracia no nosso cotidiano. Buscamos romper as barreiras que diminuem nossa capacidade de agregar valor ao negócio. Fazemos entregas frequentes e agimos rapidamente ao encontrar problemas; nosso ritmo é acelerado, mas temos tranquilidade e equilíbrio para planejar e executar nossas tarefas com qualidade.

title: Salesforce Product Owner
description:
Job Title: Salesforce Product Owner Location: LATM (Need to support PST timings) Duration: 6+ Months

What you’ll achieve Own systems & tooling needs for the business teams RevTech supports including Sales, Sales Ops, Renewals, Customer Success, Professional Services, Customer Education, and Customer Support with tools such as Salesforce Sales Cloud, Salesforce Revenue Cloud / CPQ, Salesforce Service Cloud, Salesforce Partner Relationship Management (PRM), Salesforce Experience Cloud, etc. This includes evaluating the current state, identifying gaps, and recommending what needs to change. Be the Subject Matter Expert / Technical owner for tools and systems and E2E owner to manage administration, data hygiene, configuration, fit-gap analysis, cost reduction opp, value realization contracts, best practices, access controls, and governance processes. Be tightly aligned with business partners, including Revenue, CX, R&D, Finance, Marketing, to act quickly on system related changes and drive things forward with thought leadership on what good looks like for systems. Work closely with the data & integrations team to identify & set up monitoring capabilities for the tool to proactively identify data errors & inaccuracies, pipeline failures, and recommend automation where necessary. Build tight partnerships and alignment with pillar product managers to support execution of the prioritized roadmap by contributing to roadmap initiatives, system design & architecture decisions. Operationalize initiatives and processes that include requirements gathering, data analysis, documentation of specs, QA/ UAT support, and more. Craft operational processes to ship enhancement needs and be accountable for the overall delivery. Drive new tool implementation / RFP process, and own and support the tools as the technical owner.

About you 5+ years of experience implementing solutions for enterprise business systems as a product owner or business system analyst. Functional knowledge and hands-on experience with the Salesforce Force.com platform and one or more of the following tools/capabilities: Salesforce Sales Cloud Salesforce Revenue Cloud and/or CPQ Salesforce Service Cloud Salesforce PRM GainSight, Planhat, Hook, or similar customer success platforms Certinia PSA, or similar professional services automation platforms Salesforce Experience Cloud

Domain knowledge in Sales, Channel, Customer Success, Professional Services, or Customer Support. Able to understand customer needs and translate them into product requirements. You have empathy for your customers, conduct user research, and have a deep understanding of the customer journey. Deep understanding of Agile Methodology practices, including sprint planning, backlog grooming, and sprint reviews. You lead requirements gathering, write user stories, present solution designs, and demonstrate solutions. You work collaboratively with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders, tech leads / architects, developers, and QAs. Strong communication skills to effectively communicate the vision, goals, and requirements of your product to stakeholders, customers, and team members. You listen actively, ask good questions, and provide clear and concise feedback. You adapt your communication style to different audiences and situations.

title: Senior Software Engineer - Android
description:
Design, develop, and prototype Android native customer applications for internal and external use. Participate in full app life cycle: concept, design, build, deploy, test and release to app store. Work with product teams on new product ideas, designs, prototypes and estimates. Keep up-to-date on current and upcoming features in relevant products and platforms. Drive a best practices approach to the continuous improvement of our products, processes, and tools. Assist in the creation and maintenance of documentation for all features in development

What You’ll Do: Work cross-functionally with product, design, and other engineering counterparts to execute on product and business strategy and build novel products and features that our users will love. Contribute to the full development cycle: technical design, development, test, experimentation, analysis, and launch. You’ll be reviewing code and design docs, giving feedback on product specs and mocks. Set and define standards that improve developer workflows, recommend best practices, and help coach and mentor engineers on the team to further their professional development. Continuously learn and improve your technical and non-technical abilities.

Who You Might Be: Expertise in Java or Kotlin, with 5+ years of experience in Android development. Sound software engineering fundamentals. Able to embrace the challenges of building data intensive, highly responsive, and fault tolerant apps in the constrained environment of a smartphone. Passion for developing scalable, well-designed software that improves people’s lives globally. Experience building at least one amazing Android app with a team from start to shipment. Strong organizational skills, the ability to prioritize tasks and keep projects on schedule. BS degree in Computer Science, a similar technical field of study, or equivalent practical experience. Entrepreneurial spirit. You are self-directed, innovative, and biased towards action in fast-paced environments. You love to build new things and thrive in ambiguity and even failure. Excellent communication skills. You collaborate effectively with teams in a fully remote environment and discuss complex topics with technical and non-technical audiences.

title: Senior Account Manager
description:
Senior Account Manager | Alternative Titles: Client Success Manager, Client Services, Client Relations Manager Are you ready to make a significant impact in a fast-paced, 100% remote digital agency environment? Our client, a highly regarded digital consultancy providing thought leadership content to clients throughout North America, is seeking an experienced Senior Account Manager to join their dynamic team. Location:

Remote Working Hours : 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM Eastern Time (ET).

Role Overview: As a Senior Account Manager, you will manage and expand client relationships, ensuring exceptional service delivery and tangible results. Collaborating with CEOs, C-suite executives, and industry leaders, you’ll work across a portfolio of B2B accounts to deliver innovative strategies and solutions that drive client success. This role combines strategic account management with marketing and communications expertise, making it perfect for candidates with a well-rounded background.

Key Responsibilities: Client Relationship Management: Build trust, confidence, and long-term relationships with clients while ensuring their satisfaction and retention. Strategic Development: Lead the development of thought leadership strategies, communications programs, and innovative B2B campaigns tailored to client goals. Project Oversight: Oversee delivering high-quality work on time and within budget, managing multidisciplinary teams and collaborating closely with suppliers. Data-driven insights: Analyse campaign results, provide actionable recommendations, and optimise strategies to achieve measurable outcomes for clients. Process Improvement: Identify opportunities to enhance workflows and bring cohesive solutions that streamline operations and exceed client expectations.

Qualifications: Experience: Minimum of 5 years in corporate B2B account management within an agency or client-facing environment. Industry Expertise: Proven track record working with C-Suite executives on complex communications and thought leadership strategies. Skills: Exceptional communication, project management, and financial acumen, with the ability to multitask across digital platforms and campaigns. Digital Fluency: Comprehensive understanding of the digital and social media landscape, with experience driving results in fragmented and evolving markets. Flexibility: Comfortable working in a startup environment and stepping outside predefined job descriptions to get things done.

Why Join? Work with a global team of consultants specialising in building thought leadership for CEOs, Founders, and C-Suite executives. Gain exposure to a wide array of industries and cutting-edge digital strategies. Thrive in a flexible, 100% remote environment with a supportive and collaborative team.

title: Desktop Engineering Specialist
description:
Responsibilities: • Software Packaging & rollout, with required Support documentation & knowledge transfer • Development, configuration & support of On-premise and Cloud based End User Services (e.g Microsoft 365) o Including application, endpoint and mobile device management • Provide escalated support & troubleshooting of VMWare Horizon VDI environment • Active Directory & Entra ID configuration, maintenance & administration • Provide 3rd line support for the Desktop environment, applications and hardware • Vulnerability & Software update management for Microsoft & 3rd party applications, OS & hardware • Manage, monitor & maintain file transfer services for internal & External clients • Desktop environment lifecycle development & automation • Proactive performance & reliability analysis, leading to continuous improvement of the Desktop environment • Collaborate with Internal & External Customers/Vendors to pro-actively obtain information regarding applications for packaging, problem solving or escalation

Mandatory Skills Description: • Packaging experience with MECM/Intune • Experience and strong knowledge of Linux • PowerShell scripting • Advanced VDI Administration & Troubleshooting • Advanced Active directory administration including GPO, Intune • Good understanding of control principles - Release, Change Management, etc • Used to working to best practice methodologies such as ITIL • Microsoft Office Suite 2016/365. • Market data applications. • Excellent understanding of build and client distribution architectures (MECM)

Nice-to-Have Skills Description:

• VMWare Horizon • Other scripting languages • Basic T-SQL query experience • Microsoft 365 services deployment & engineering • Microsoft Azure foundational knowledge • Support of Configuration Manager • Chocolatey

Languages: English: C1 Advanced

title: Application Security Engineer SR
description:
Description Important Information Location:

Brazil Job Mode:

Full-time Work Mode:

Work from home

Responsibilities and Duties As a Application Security Engineer, you will lead a comprehensive security program that begins with assessing vulnerabilities and creating prioritized remediation plans; Implementing OWASP-based security best practices and threat modeling frameworks throughout the SDLC; Establish automated security controls through SAST/DAST integration in CI/CD pipelines, help conduct penetration testing, and create standardized procedures for identifying and addressing security issues; Additionally, you will help develop and deliver secure coding training programs and maintain thorough documentation, ensuring the organization maintains a strong security posture through both technical implementation and team enablement.

Essential Skills Strong experience with SAST/DAST tools; Proficiency in penetration testing and vulnerability assessment; Knowledge of common security frameworks (OWASP, NIST); Experience with security incident response; Strong programming knowledge; Understanding of CI/CD pipelines; Cloud security expertise (AWS preferred); Database security knowledge; Experience implementing security automation tools; Familiarity with DevSecOps practices; Knowledge of security testing frameworks; Experience with code analysis tools; Experience in application security; Proven experience implementing security programs; Track record of security remediation projects; Experience creating and delivering security training.

Additional Skills Certifications (preferred): - CISSP, CSSLP, or equivalent; - CEH or OSCP for penetration testing; - Cloud security certifications (AWS Security); - OWASP certifications.

About Encora

Encora is the preferred digital engineering and modernization partner of some of the world’s leading enterprises and digital native companies. With over 9,000 experts in 47+ offices and innovation labs worldwide, Encora’s technology practices include Product Engineering & Development, Cloud Services, Quality Engineering, DevSecOps, Data & Analytics, Digital Experience, Cybersecurity, and AI & LLM Engineering.

At Encora, we hire professionals based solely on their skills and qualifications, and do not discriminate based on age, disability, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or nationality.

title: Node Developer - Remote
description:
At INDI, we're passionate about empowering individuals and businesses worldwide. Our cutting-edge recruiters connect leading companies with top talent, fostering a dynamic environment where innovation thrives. Join us in shaping the future of work.

Overview of the Role:

Are you ready to join a dynamic Development team and take on diverse projects with multicultural teams worldwide? We're seeking Node Developers who are proactive, collaborative team players passionate about programming and dedicated to delivering exceptional user experiences. This is an exciting opportunity to grow with one of the fastest-growing companies in the industry!

Responsibilities:

Q: What will you do as a Node Developer? A: You'll architect Bandit backend systems using the best practices available. You'll implement and iterate on features swiftly and strategically, adapting to the demands of our fast-paced startup environment.

Q: How will you contribute to API design and implementation? A: You'll play a crucial role in designing, extending, and implementing APIs to ensure robust functionality and seamless integration across platforms.

Q: How do you maintain engineering quality? A: You'll uphold high standards through rigorous code reviews, comprehensive unit testing, and insightful analytics to drive continuous improvement.

Q: What role does automation play in your work? A: Automating processes and developing tools will be key to enhancing engineering efficiency and productivity.

Q: How will you influence engineering processes? A: You'll define and refine engineering processes to support successful product launches and releases, ensuring our solutions meet the highest standards.

Q: How can you help us expand our engineering team? A: Conducting technical interviews will allow you to contribute to the growth of our world-class engineering team, bringing in top talent to drive our success.

Requirements:

Q: How much experience is required? A: You should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in Node development, demonstrating your expertise and proficiency in the field.

Q: What specific expertise is needed in addition to Node development? A: Experience in Video and HLS (HTTP Live Streaming) will be essential for addressing the diverse technical challenges you'll encounter.

Q: What language skills are necessary? A: Proficiency in advanced English is required to effectively communicate and collaborate with our global teams and clients.

Benefits: • Flexibility: Choose where and how you work for enhanced creativity and innovation. • Tailored Compensation: Personalize your earnings to suit your financial goals. • Tech-Driven Tools: Access cutting-edge resources for seamless collaboration and productivity. • Autonomous Workflow: Take control of your schedule to achieve work-life balance. • Well-being: Enjoy generous leave policies for rest and rejuvenation. • Diversity & Inclusion: Thrive in a diverse and inclusive environment. • Collaboration: Engage with industry leaders for collective growth. • Development: Access mentorship and growth opportunities for continuous advancement.

If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: Billing Analyst
description:
Billing Analyst

Job Title: Billing Analyst - Brazil

Type: Full-time, Contract position

Why Mindglobal? Mindglobal, recognized in Gartner’s 2024 Market Guide, is a leader in Telecom Expense Management (TEM), helping Fortune 500 enterprises worldwide manage and reduce their telecom expenses. As we continue to grow, we’re expanding our financial team and looking to hire talented individuals like you immediately!

Analyze billing, create standard and custom reports, and consult your data-driven recommendations via written and verbal communication to your customers. We’re hiring immediately!

This is a contract position. Benefits (such as healthcare, paid time off or 13th month pay) are not provided. You will be an independent direct contractor ("freelancer") with Mindglobal and paid hourly for time worked. You will be scheduled to work 40 hours per week and as a contractor can choose your time off and holidays.
